summary: वापस आकर काम करें: दिल्ली बीजेपी अध्यक्ष ने सीएम केजरीवाल को पत्र लिखा

text: Former Bihar CM and Hindustani Awam Morcha chief Jitan Ram Manjhi has said RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav will be an ideal replacement if Bihar CM Nitish Kumar vacates the post to join the Grand Alliance. Earlier, RJD supremo Lalu Prasad Yadav said his son Tejashwi will be the party's Chief Ministerial candidate in the Bihar Assembly polls scheduled for 2020.
summary: बिहार सीएम नीतीश के लिए तेजस्वी का आदर्श प्रतिस्थापन: पूर्व सीएम मांझी

text: US-based Uber has appealed to a London court to grant the startup its license in the city, claiming that it has changed. The appeal will begin from Monday to determine whether Uber is fit to operate in the city. Last year, London's transport authority refused to renew Uber's license, citing failures in reporting criminal offences and background checks on drivers.
summary: उबेर ने लंदन में लाइसेंस के नुकसान की अपील की, दावा किया कि यह बदल गया है

text: A 32-year-old man has been arrested for allegedly stabbing his four-day-old newborn girl as he wanted a son, the Gujarat police said on Monday. The police said, "It was the sixth daughter for 30-year-old Vimla and Vishnu." After the accused stabbed his daughter, his in-laws caught him and handed him over to the police.
summary: गुजराती नवजात लड़की को मारता है क्योंकि वह चाहता था कि 6 वां बच्चा लड़का हो

text: Three alcohol addicts died in Bihar's Begusarai after consuming around 12 bottles of spirit, meant to be used for medical purposes, police said on Monday. While the body of one of the deceased has been sent for post-mortem and forensic tests, the families of other victims denied permission for post-mortem. Bihar has witnessed a complete alcohol ban for two years.
summary: शुष्क बिहार में चिकित्सा भावना का उपभोग करने के बाद 3 नशेड़ी मर जाते हैं

text: The 12 AAP leaders who were arrested for allegedly staging a protest at the Raipur airport after "not being allowed" to meet PM Narendra Modi were granted bail by a court today. The leaders allegedly held a demonstration without authorisation and obstructed public servants in the discharge of their duties. However, AAP had claimed their arrest was "politically motivated".
summary: पीएम के रायपुर दौरे के दौरान विरोध करने वाले AAP नेताओं को मिली जमानत

text: In a suspected case of honour killing, a 20-year-old woman was allegedly hacked to death by her father for eloping with a younger boy in Rajasthan. They had eloped to avoid their parents' anger, following which the girl's parents filed a police complaint. Although both families later agreed to their marriage, the girl's father allegedly murdered her in her sleep.
summary: छोटे लड़के के साथ संभोग करने के लिए बेटी को मारता है आदमी

text: A 14-year-old girl was allegedly raped by her maths tuition teacher in a UP village, the police said on Monday. The tutor allegedly took a video of the sexual assault, which emerged on social media, and threatened the girl with dire consequences if she told anyone. Her father has approached the police, even as the tutor is on the run.
summary: मैथ्स ट्यूटर ने 14 साल की लड़की से किया रेप, यूपी में वीडियो लेता है

text: After Prime Minister Narendra Modi described GST as a symbol of cooperative federalism, former Finance Minister P Chidambaram tweeted, "why did the BJP oppose it and stall it for 5 years?" He added, "Why do the PM, FM and Acting FM refuse to speak on the numerous flaws in the implementation of GST?"
summary: बीजेपी ने 5 साल तक GST का विरोध क्यों किया: Ex-FM चिदंबरम

text: NITI Aayog Vice Chairman Rajiv Kumar has said petrol and diesel can't be brought under GST as the "total state and central taxes on them are around 90%". "I can't see how any state will take a cut so huge as the highest GST rate is 28%," Kumar said. He added that a new slab will have to be created.
summary: 90% कर के साथ, GST अव्यावहारिक: NITI Aayog के तहत ईंधन प्राप्त करना

text: Idea Cellular's market capitalisation fell nearly Ã¢ÂÂ¹1,900 crore to  Ã¢ÂÂ¹24,502 crore on Monday after reports that its merger with Vodafone India may not meet the expected June 30 timeline. The Telecom Department is reportedly looking to raise a Ã¢ÂÂ¹4,700-crore demand related to one-time spectrum charges on Vodafone. Notably, the combined entity will be India's largest telecom operator, replacing Airtel.
summary: वोडाफोन के विलय में देरी की खबरों पर आइडिया एम-कैप गिर गया है

text: Actor Shah Rukh Khan, who completed 26 years in Bollywood today, tweeted, "Exactly half a lifetime of being 'others'". "Expressing love, happiness, sadness, dancing, falling and flying," he added. Shah Rukh further wrote, "Hope I have touched small bits of your hearts and hope I can do so for the whole lifetime."
summary: 'अन्य' होने का आधा जीवन: SRK B'wood में 26 साल

text: Egyptian goalkeeper Essam El-Hadary, aged 45 years and 161 days, has become the oldest player to play a FIFA World Cup match. El-Hadary achieved the feat by featuring in the Group A match against Saudi Arabia on Monday. The 1973-born goalkeeper overtook ex-Colombian goalkeeper Faryd MondragÃÂ³n, who had set the previous record aged 43 years and 3 days in 2014.
summary: 45-वर्षीय एल-हैदरी फीफा विश्व कप मैच में खेलने के लिए सबसे उम्रदराज हैं

text: 'Disgrace of GijÃÂ³n' game is the name given to 1982 World Cup Group 2's final match between West Germany and Austria that took place in GijÃÂ³n on June 25. Algeria, who were second in the group, needed Austria to draw or win to advance. However, West Germany won 1-0 and both the teams were accused of colluding to eliminate Algeria.
summary: 1982 के WC में हुए 'गिज़ोन' के खेल का अपमान क्या है?

text: Sandeep Patil, who was a member of India's 1983 Cricket World Cup-winning squad, shared an old picture of then captain Kapil Dev celebrating the victory. In the picture, Dev can be seen with his tongue out, holding a placard which reads, "The more you underrate us, the better we play." Notably, India won their first-ever CWC on June 25, 1983.
summary: 35-साल पुरानी तस्वीर कपिल देव ने 1983 विश्व कप जीत का जश्न मनाते हुए दिखाई

text: Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi gave its founder and CEO Lei Jun about $1.5 billion (Ã¢ÂÂ¹10,200 crore) in stock to "reward him for his contributions" ahead of its IPO. The bonus is reportedly not tied to any future performance metrics or goals. Xiaomi President Lin Bin said the board approved the stock award unanimously with Lei Jun knowing nothing about it.
summary: Xiaomi ने सीईओ लेई जून को आईपीओ से आगे ¢ 20010,200 करोड़ का तोहफा दिया

text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday enquired about the health of an IAF guard who reportedly fainted due to a heat stroke during Seychelles President Danny Faure's ceremonial welcome at Rashtrapati Bhavan. PM Modi spent a few minutes with him and asked him to be careful about his health. Faure landed in Gujarat on Friday for a six-day India tour.
summary: IAF गार्ड समारोह के दौरान बेहोश, पीएम ने उनके स्वास्थ्य के बारे में पूछा

text: Anupam Kher, who was awarded Outstanding Achievement In Cinema Award at International Indian Film Academy (IIFA) Award 2018, has dedicated his award to the struggling actors. "I dedicate this award to all the struggling actors who have to make it without God Fathers," tweeted Anupam. He also thanked Anil Kapoor who gave an introductory speech to his life and career.
summary: अनुपम खेर ने संघर्षरत अभिनेताओं को अपना IIFA अवार्ड समर्पित किया

text: Ranbir Kapoor has said that he hardly talks to his cousin and actress Kareena Kapoor Khan while he is close to his brother-in-law and actor Saif Ali Khan. "Our sensibilities are very similar...I really enjoy...talking to him," he added. Karan Johar had once called Ranbir, Kareena "the information and the broadcasting ministry of Bollywood", on his show 'Koffee With Karan'.
summary: करीना और मैं मुश्किल से बात करते हैं, मैं सैफ के करीब हूं: रणबीर कपूर

text: Following the box-office performance of Remo D'Souza's 'Race 3', the producers have asked Remo to reduce the budget of an upcoming 4D dance film starring Katrina Kaif and Varun Dhawan, as per reports. "Remo didn't budge...He's sure that with stars like Varun...Katrina, the film will make profit...The makers finally relented on the amount," reports stated.
summary: रेमो ने कैटरीना-वरुण की 4 डी फिल्म: रिपोर्ट्स के बजट में कटौती करने की बात कही

text: Malayalam commentator Shiju Damodaran's reaction to Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo's free-kick goal against Spain in the 2018 FIFA World Cup has gone viral. Reacting to Damodaran's clip, a user tweeted, "Even Ronaldo is not so excited as the commentator." "The commentary burns more calories than the actual game," wrote another user.
summary: रोनाल्डो लक्ष्य के लिए मलयालम टिप्पणीकार की प्रतिक्रिया वायरल हो जाती है

text: Argentine legend Diego Maradona has requested a meeting with Argentina squad before their do-or-die World Cup match on Tuesday. Maradona said he was "furious" and "very upset" after Argentina lost their second group match to Croatia. "We're going to defend our honour...Anyone who has worn that shirt can't see it being trampled like that by a Croatian team," he added.
summary: माराडोना करो या मरो मैच से पहले अर्जेंटीना टीम से मिलना चाहता है

text: US-based conversational AI sales startup Tact.ai has raised $27 million in a funding round from Amazon's Alexa Fund, Microsoft's M12 and Salesforce Ventures. The round also saw participation from existing investors Accel Partners, Redpoint Ventures and Upfront Ventures. Founded in 2012, the startup offers a sales platform that turns a seller's connected device into an AI-powered smart assistant.
summary: AI स्टार्टअप Tact.ai को Microsoft, अमेज़ॅन, अन्य से $ 27mn मिलता है

text: China has launched bird-shaped drones fitted with a camera, GPS antenna, and satellite communication capability, to monitor citizens living in different parts of the country. The program reportedly codenamed "Dove", is run by Song Bifeng, a professor at Northwestern Polytechnical University. These drones replicate about 90% of the movements of a real dove like diving and turning in the air.
summary: चीन ने नागरिकों की निगरानी के लिए पक्षी के आकार के ड्रोन लॉन्च किए

text: Technology giant Apple is reportedly working on a high-end version of its wireless AirPods with noise cancellation and water-resistant technology, according to reports. The updated AirPods would come with a new case that is compatible with the Apple's new wireless charging pad, reports further suggested. The AirPods are expected to launch sometime in 2019.
summary: उच्च अंत जल प्रतिरोधी AirPods पर काम कर रहे Apple: रिपोर्ट

text: Jeff Bezos-led e-commerce giant Amazon allows workers, who are about to be fired, to plead their case with a jury consisting of their co-workers. The workers who lose the case get to choose between a severance pay or a performance-improvement plan. However, reports suggested only 30% of employees who appeal their manager's criticisms are able to keep their jobs.
summary: फायरिंग का सामना करने वाले अमेज़ॅन कर्मचारी सहकर्मियों की जूरी से अपील कर सकते हैं

text: Mukesh Ambani's Reliance is planning to launch its e-commerce business by end of this year through an app meant for local retailers and stores. The app will help merchants manage inventory, logistics, and supply chain requirements and even accept payments and credit money back. The app has already been in pilot mode with about 5,000 merchants across Mumbai and Ahmedabad.
summary: मुकेश अंबानी की रिलायंस 2018 के अंत तक ई-कॉम बिज़ लॉन्च करेगी

text: A lawyer named Bachan Lal Soni was shot dead by assailants in Allahabad district today, the police has said. Following this, district court lawyers staged a road blockade and demanded the immediate arrest of assailants and compensation to the family. The murder comes a month after unidentified motorcycle-borne assailants shot dead district court lawyer Rajesh Srivastava in Allahabad.n
summary: यूपी में दिन के उजाले में वकील की गोली मारकर हत्या

text: A 23-year old fisherman, who was accused of sexually assaulting a four-year-old girl, was found hanging from a tree in Tamil Nadu's Rameswaram on Sunday, the police said. The man had allegedly sexually assaulted the minor girl in his neighbourhood, following which her parents had lodged a police complaint.nn
summary: 4 साल की बच्ची के यौन हमले के लिए तैयार, टीएन आदमी जीवन समाप्त करता है

text: The Maharashtra CID is still investigating a complaint filed by social activist Anna Hazare in 2009 against former minister Padamsinh Patil for allegedly conspiring to kill him, an RTI enquiry has revealed. The department has not yet filed a chargesheet in the case. Patil is also facing trial for plotting the murder of Congress leader Pawanraje Nimbalkar in 2006.
summary: CID अभी भी हजारे द्वारा 2009 हत्या की साजिश की जांच कर रही है: RTI

text: A 50-year-old man allegedly committed suicide by jumping in front of a moving train in UP's Muzaffarnagar, the police said. His body has been sent for post mortem, while the reason behind the man taking the extreme step is yet to be ascertained, the police added. In another incident, a 21-year-old man and his lover consumed poison in Jaibhagwanpur village. n
summary: यूपी में ट्रेन के सामने कूदकर बुजुर्ग ने की जिंदगी खत्म

text: A man in Assam has been arrested for allegedly creating a fake Twitter account in his brother-in-law's name and tweeting about a bomb blast in Guwahati on Independence Day. Ikramul Haque was apparently taking revenge after his wife's family filed a case of cruelty against him. Haque's wife had moved to her parents' house after accusing him of torturing her.
summary: आदमी रिश्तेदार का फर्जी ट्विटर अकाउंट बनाता है, ब्लास्ट की धमकी देता है

text: The decomposed body of a Class 9 female student was found hanging from the ceiling fan of her hostel room in Mysuru on Sunday. The girl was feeling guilty as she had spent a night with her boyfriend after returning from a school trip, reports said. The warden of the hostel has been suspended and the boy has been booked.
summary: कक्षा 9 की लड़की ने प्रेमी के साथ रात बिताने के बाद आत्म हत्या कर ली

text: A youth allegedly sexually harrassed a school girl and threatened to throw acid on her after she turned down his proposal of marriage in Uttar Pradesh's Muzaffarnagar, the police said on Monday. The police added that they have registered a case and launched a hunt to nab the accused, Shakir Ali. n
summary: यूपी में शादी का प्रस्ताव ठुकराने पर लड़की ने किया यौन शोषण

text: A 22-year-old UP youth, who allegedly drugged and gangraped a minor girl with three others on Saturday, has died at a hospital under mysterious circumstances. Soon after police officers registered the rape case, he was admitted to the hospital in a critical condition. His family has claimed he was thrashed by the girl's relatives, while cops believe he committed suicide.
summary: यूपी की नाबालिग से 4 लोगों ने किया गैंगरेप, 1 आरोपी की अस्पताल में मौत

text: The Tata Group is re-entering the home appliances market after 20 years through a joint venture between Voltas, a Tata company and Turkey's Arcelik. The joint venture will manufacture refrigerators, microwave ovens, washing machines and dishwashers under the Voltas Beko brand at a reported investment of Ã¢ÂÂ¹1,000-crore. Its first manufacturing facility in the country will be set up in Gujarat.
summary: टाटा 20 फ्रिज के बाद फ्रिज, वॉशिंग मशीन व्यवसाय में फिर से प्रवेश करने के लिए

text: The CBI has moved the Supreme Court challenging bail to former Finance Minister P Chidambaram's son Karti Chidambaram in the INX Media case. The agency has alleged that Karti received $1 million as bribe for facilitating the foreign investment clearance to INX Media. The Delhi High Court granted bail on March 23 to Karti, who was arrested on February 28.
summary: INX मीडिया मामले में कार्ति चिदंबरम को सीबीआई ने दी जमानत चुनौती

text: Reliance Jio has secured $1-billion worth of term loan covered by the Korea Trade Insurance Corporation (K-SURE) to fund network equipment purchase from Samsung Electronics and Ace Technologies. The facility is K-SURE's largest deal in India as well as the largest deal supported by it in telecom sector globally. The loan has a repayment time of nearly 11 years.
summary: सैमसंग ने उपकरणों के लिए सैमसंग को भुगतान करने के लिए $ 1 बिलियन का ऋण लिया

text: Former cricketer and 1983 World Cup-winning squad member Sandip Patil has revealed he broke a floating rib during practice and carried the injury throughout the 1983 tournament. "Indian cricket was different back then, there was no outside help, or any physios...injuries were just considered part of the game," he said. Patil had scored a half-century against England in the semi-final.
summary: मैंने 1983 विश्व कप टूटी पसलियों के साथ खेला: संदीप पाटिल

text: A journalist has filed an FIR against a woman passenger who attacked her during a shared Uber ride in Mumbai on Monday. "Uber refused to give her details stating customer privacy," the journalist tweeted. She alleged that the co-passenger was miffed over being dropped in the last even though she 'paid' the most, and went on to racially abuse her.
summary: उबर में एक महिला पर पत्रकार ने किया शारीरिक हमला, FIR दर्ज

text: Reacting to External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj being trolled over the transfer of a Lucknow passport officer who allegedly harassed an interfaith couple, Swara Bhasker tweeted, "Sick and shameful." "She and her ministry did their job conscientiously and as per the law of our land," Swara added. Vishal Dadlani tweeted, "Thanks for rising above the atmosphere of petty hatred, Ma'am!"
summary: बीमार, शर्मनाक: सुषमा पर स्वरा को पासपोर्ट पंक्ति पर ट्रोल किया जा रहा है

text: Nawazuddin Siddiqui has dedicated his Best Supporting Actor IIFA Award, which he won for the film 'Mom', to late actress Sridevi. "It was once in a lifetime opportunity to work with the first female superstar Sridevi and I dedicate my award as a tribute to her," he tweeted. Sridevi was posthumously named the Best Actress for 'Mom' at IIFA 2018.
summary: नवाजुद्दीन ने दिवंगत अभिनेत्री श्रीदेवी को अपना IIFA पुरस्कार समर्पित किया

text: Talking about doing television roles, Kareena Kapoor said, "I'm not averse to taking up something on...small screen, but it can't be a daily soap." "I'm open to any kind of medium. But again, it has to be something really different...for me to say yes to it," she added. Kareena further said some shows on the digital space have "outstanding writing".
summary: टीवी भूमिकाओं के विपरीत नहीं है, लेकिन यह दैनिक साबुन नहीं हो सकता है: करीना

text: The final group matches in FIFA World Cup have been played simultaneously since 1986 to avoid any suspicion of an advantage. The decision came after West Germany defeated Austria 1-0 by colluding to eliminate debutants Algeria on goal difference in 1982. Algeria had played their last group game a day before West Germany-Austria match and later lodged an official complaint.
summary: विश्व कप में आखिरी ग्रुप गेम एक साथ क्यों खेला जाता है?

text: Talking about the proposed cutting of over 14,000 trees to redevelop seven colonies in Delhi, Minister of State for Housing and Urban Affairs HS Puri said no trees will be cut till he's a minister. He added, "For every tree that's cut, we will plant ten more." The Delhi High Court has stayed the cutting of trees till July 2.
summary: कोई पेड़ काटने के लिए नहीं; कटवाएंगे तो 10 और लगाएंगे: दिल्ली के मंत्री

text: North Korea has decided to skip its annual 'anti-US imperialism' rally marking the start of the Korean War following the summit between the two countries. Last year, North Korea issued anti-US postage stamps during the event, which was reportedly attended by nearly 1 lakh people. Earlier, North Korea removed anti-US souvenirs, including stamps, postcards and posters, sold at gift shops.
summary: एन कोरिया ने वार्षिक 'अमेरिका विरोधी साम्राज्यवाद' रैली के बाद शिखर सम्मेलन किया

text: A Malaysian mosque has temporarily banned tourists after a video of two female visitors dancing on a wall outside the Muslim holy site went viral. Mosque officials said the move will preserve the sanctity of Islam. However, government officials said legal action would not be taken against the pair as they were probably unaware of the severity of their actions.
summary: डांस वीडियो के वायरल होने के बाद मलेशिया की मस्जिद में पर्यटक पहुंचे

text: The first look poster of Sanya Malhotra starrer 'Pataakha' has been released. Also starring Sunil Grover in the lead role, 'Pataakha' will reportedly mark the Bollywood debut of TV actress Radhika Madan. Sanya and Radhika will be playing sisters in the film. The Vishal Bhardwaj directorial, which was earlier titled 'Chhuriyaan', will be releasing on September 28.
summary: पहले सान्या मल्होत्रा स्टारर फिल्म 'पटाखा' का पोस्टर देखें

text: Actress Disha Patani, while responding to the rumours of dating actor Tiger Shroff, said, "I want to keep my life as personal as possible." She added, "If I was planning something, I wouldn't share it." She further said that Tiger has impacted her a lot and is a great role model. "His work ethics...physique motivates everybody around him," she said.
summary: लाइफ को पर्सनल रखना चाहते हैं: दिशा ने टाइगर को डेट करने की अफवाह

text: The International Indian Film Academy (IIFA) Awards 2018 honoured late actor Shashi Kapoor for his contribution to Indian cinema. "Thank you for honouring Shashi Kapoor with his award...It's a moment of pride for us," said Rishi Kapoor, while accepting the award on his uncle's behalf. Shashi passed away in December 2017 at the age of 79 due to liver problems.
summary: शशि ने IIFA में भारतीय सिनेमा में योगदान के लिए सम्मानित किया

text: A video of Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo asking a group of Iran fans singing outside his hotel to let him sleep has surfaced online. Iranian supporters played drums and vuvuzelas outside, after which Ronaldo came to his room window and pleaded them to stop. Portugal will face Iran in their last 2018 FIFA World Cup group match tonight.
summary: रोनाल्डो प्रशंसकों को अपने होटल के बाहर गाने के लिए कहते हैं कि वह उन्हें सोने दें

text: PlantMD, an app made by high school students, Shada Mehdi and Nile Ravanell, has been designed to detect plant diseases in real time. It has been built on Google's machine learning library for data programming, TensorFlow. PlantMD app was inspired by Penn State University's research unit PlantVillage which created an app to assist farmers in Africa to grow better crops.
summary: हाई स्कूल के छात्रों द्वारा बनाई गई ऐप पौधों की बीमारियों का पता लगाने में मदद करती है

text: Apple has filed patent for a technology which can recognise users' handwriting on iPad devices in real time. The technology will allow users to write words and sentences on the screen, which will then be converted into script for typing. The patent also shows the system working with both finger inputs as well as with a stylus.
summary: Apple iPad के लिए लिखावट पहचान तकनीक के लिए पेटेंट फाइल करता है

text: Ahead of the Rajasthan Assembly elections, five-time MLA Ghanshyam Tiwari on Monday resigned from the BJP to join the Bharat Vahini Party, which was floated by his son Akhilesh. Slamming CM Vasundhara Raje over her autocratic governance style, Tiwari said the BJP will not be able to win the Assembly elections under her leadership.
summary: 5 बार के विधायक घनश्याम तिवारी ने बीजेपी को बेटे की पार्टी में शामिल होने के लिए कहा

text: Speaking at a press conference, BJP spokesperson Sudhanshu Trivedi on Monday said Congress still has not apologised for the 'India is Indira and Indira is India' slogan. Adding that then Congress President Devakanta Barua gave the slogan during Emergency, he said, "For those who understand Hinduism and Hindutva, the country is only 'Bharat Mata', but for Congress 'India is Indira'."
summary: कांग्रेस ने 'भारत इंदिरा है' के नारे के लिए माफी नहीं मांगी: भाजपा

text: Finance Minister Arun Jaitley on Sunday compared the Emergency imposed by former PM Indira Gandhi to Adolf Hitler's Nazi Germany. He said both the leaders used a "republican Constitution to transform democracy into dictatorship" and arrested the Opposition leaders to gain a majority in the Parliament. The press censorship laws imposed under their leadership were also similar, Jaitley added.
summary: जेटली ने इंदिरा के आपातकाल की तुलना हिटलर के नाजी जर्मनी से की

text: Gurugram-based online insurance startup PolicyBazaar has raised more than $200 million in a new investment round led by SoftBank's $100-billion Vision Fund. The Series F funding round also saw participation from its existing investor InfoEdge and is reportedly expected to value the startup at $1 billion. Founded in 2008, PolicyBazaar helps consumers compare and analyse insurance products.
summary: सॉफ्टबैंक विजन फंड की अगुवाई में पॉलिसीबाजार ने $ 200 मिलियन जुटाए

text: Assam CM Sarbananda Sonowal has announced a Ã¢ÂÂ¹100-crore relief package for the rehabilitation of people in three districts of Barak Valley after floods and landslides claimed 24 lives. Nearly two lakh people have been affected by the floods and 3,100 hectares of crop area has been damaged. Over 27,000 people have been provided shelter in 133 government-run relief camps.
summary: असम ने package--100 करोड़ के राहत पैकेज की घोषणा की क्योंकि बाढ़ 24 को मार देती है

text: Reacting to waterlogging and traffic disruptions in Mumbai due to heavy rain, a user tweeted, "Who needs Niagara Falls when you have Bandra Falls." While a tweet read, "Rain Gods were private bank employees in past lives," another read, "'My mom just informed me there is water logging' is every Mumbai millennial's go-to line to get the day off."
summary: जब आपके पास बांद्रा फॉल्स, ट्वीट उपयोगकर्ता है, तो नियाग्रा की जरूरत किसे है

text: An Army officer was killed and four of his family members were grievously injured after their car caught fire on Lucknow-Agra Expressway near Nagla Hardu village on Sunday, police said. The family was returning from the banks of river Ganga in Farrukhabad when the incident occurred. While the officer died on the spot, his family members are receiving treatment.
summary: लखनऊ-आगरा एक्सप्रेसवे पर कार में आग लगने से जवान की मौत

text: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath on Sunday said, "When BHU can provide reservation for Dalits and backward students, why not AMU?" He added, "Those who are saying that Dalits are being discriminated against must be asked when will they raise issue of reservation for Dalits in Aligarh Muslim University and Jamia Millia University?"
summary: AMU दलितों को आरक्षण क्यों नहीं दे सकता: यूपी सीएम योगी

text: Rebel BJP leader Shatrughan Sinha will attend a rally organised by the AAP against the "undeclared emergency-like situation created by PM Narendra Modi" in the country at PM Modi's constituency Varanasi on Monday. Former Finance Minister Yashwant Sinha said he will not be able to attend the rally over health reasons, adding that Shatrughan will represent his interests.
summary: पीएम मोदी के निर्वाचन क्षेत्र में पीएम की रैली में भाग लेने के लिए शत्रुघ्न

text: After IndiGo's president Aditya Ghosh, the airline's Chief Commercial Officer Sanjay Kumar has resigned with effect from July 15 this year. Kumar, who has been associated with the low-cost carrier for the last 12 years, is leaving the job "to pursue other career interests". William Boulter, currently the Chief Strategy Officer, will be taking over from Sanjay Kumar.
summary: प्रेज़ घोष के बाद, इंडिगो के मुख्य वाणिज्यिक अधिकारी ने चुटकी ली

text: State-run Punjab National Bank (PNB) has reportedly set up loan recovery cells in all its 6,900 branches. It has reportedly deployed nearly 25,000 employees to recover bad loans and created a stressed asset vertical led by four general managers at its central headquarters. PNB's gross bad loans stood at Ã¢ÂÂ¹86,620 crore or 18.38% of the gross advances as of March.
summary: पीएनबी अपनी सभी 6,900 शाखाओं में ऋण वसूली सेल स्थापित करता है

text: An anonymous whistleblower has questioned Infosys over the delay in filing a mandatory form, which contains key financials and risks faced by the company, with US regulators. A company typically delays the filing only when there is an ongoing investigation by the market regulator, the whistleblower claimed. The whistleblower has asked Infosys to disclose whether it has a pending investigation.
summary: व्हिसलब्लोअर ने इन्फोसिस पर तथ्यों का खुलासा नहीं करने का आरोप लगाया

text: Army Major Nikhil Handa, arrested on Sunday for the alleged murder of another Major Amit Dwivedi's wife Shailja, made over 3,000 calls to her this year, police said. Handa reportedly gifted the deceased a phone and her husband once caught them during a video call, police added. Handa, who wanted to marry Shailja, murdered her after a heated argument.
summary: सेना मेजर ने अपने सहयोगी की पत्नी को एक साल में 3,000 कॉल किए

text: The Delhi High Court on Monday stayed the cutting of over 14,000 trees for the redevelopment of seven colonies in south Delhi till the next date of hearing on July 2. The court asked the state-owned company which is overseeing the project if the capital can afford to cut these trees. The stay comes amid widespread protests by Delhi residents.
summary: उच्च न्यायालय ने दिल्ली में 14 जुलाई तक 14,000 पेड़ों को काटने पर रोक लगाई

text: The entire police department of Ocampo in Mexico has been detained on suspicion of involvement in mayoral candidate Fernando Angeles Juarez's murder. The probe is focused on potential violations of the police code of conduct. Several politicians have been murdered ahead of the elections, in which Mexico will vote for a new President and other federal, state and municipal posts.
summary: हत्या के बाद हिरासत में लिया गया मेक्सिको के एक शहर का पूरा पुलिस बल

text: India is the only country to win all three types of Cricket World Cups - 60 overs, 50 overs and 20 overs. On June 25, 1983, Kapil Dev-led India defeated two-time defending champions Windies to become the second country to win a 60-over World Cup. MS Dhoni later led India to 20-over (2007) and 50-over (2011) World Cup triumphs.
summary: भारत विश्व कप में 60, 50, 20 जीतने वाला एकमात्र देश है

text: Talking about her wish to become a director, Sonam Kapoor said, "Be it Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Aanand L Rai [or] R Balki...any director...I work with has told me, 'Please direct [a film]'". "It's surely not happening right now, as I'm...tired from working so much," she added. Sonam further said she could be directing a film in two to three years.
summary: निर्देशक भंसाली, बाल्की ने कहा कि मुझे फिल्मों का निर्देशन करना चाहिए: सोनम

text: Twelve teenage footballers and their coach are feared to be trapped in a flooded Thai cave after they didn't return from practice on Saturday. According to investigators, the group crawled into Tham Luang Nang Non Cave through a path, which was later blocked by rising waters. Footprints of the team were found but the rescuers haven't found the group yet.
summary: किशोर फुटबॉल टीम ने 2 दिनों के लिए बाढ़ वाली थाई गुफा में फंसने की आशंका जताई

text: The Gujarat High Court on Monday sentenced three convicts in the Naroda Patiya case to ten years of imprisonment. The three convicts were earlier acquitted by a trial court in 2012. At least 97 people were killed in Naroda Patiya, a Muslim-dominated locality, during the 2002 Gujarat riots. The riots had occurred a day after the Godhra train burning.
summary: नरोदा पाटिया मामले में 3 दोषियों को 10 साल की जेल की सजा

text: External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj on Sunday liked several tweets that trolled her over the transfer of a Lucknow passport officer who allegedly humiliated and harassed an interfaith couple. Swaraj wrote that she was "honoured" with these tweets. The tweets that she liked had accused her of minority appeasement and called her "visa mata" for favouring visa applicants from Pakistan.
summary: सम्मानित: स्वराज को पासपोर्ट पंक्ति के बाद ट्रोल द्वारा ट्वीट पसंद हैं

text: PM Narendra Modi on Sunday night broke protocol by travelling without his security to AIIMS Delhi to meet ailing former PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee, reports said. The hospital authorities were also not aware of PM Modi's visit until he arrived. Vajpayee was hospitalised two weeks ago and is said to be responding well to his treatment.
summary: पीएम मोदी वाजपेयी से मिलने के लिए बिना सुरक्षा के एम्स गए

text: Jamaat-ud-Dawah chief and 26/11 Mumbai attack mastermind Hafiz Saeed openly championed the need for violence in the Kashmir Valley while addressing his supporters in Lahore, Pakistan. "A new era has begun and with God's wishes Kashmir will be an independent state," he said. Earlier this year, Jamaat-ud-Dawah had said it would love to launch jihad against India.
summary: कश्मीर घाटी में फैली हिंसा: हाफिज सईद

text: A class 9 boy was found dead in the washroom of the Sainik School in South Karnataka's Kodagu district on Saturday. The boy's father, who is a sports coach in the same school, had earlier informed authorities that his son was being harassed by a few teachers in the school. The police have registered a case of murder.
summary: कर्नाटक में स्कूल वॉशरूम में कक्षा 9 का लड़का मृत मिला

text: London has been voted the most desirable city in the world for overseas workers, according to a survey conducted by the Boston Consulting Group and totaljobs.com. London beat New York, Berlin and Barcelona to take the top spot. Meanwhile, the UK overall has dropped three places in the country rankings, falling from second in 2014 to fifth.
summary: विदेशी श्रमिकों के लिए लंदन सबसे वांछनीय शहर है

text: North Korea on Monday said the country will continue to ignore Japan unless it halts hostilities against its neighbour, such as large-scale military drills and efforts to boost military readiness. "Japan should break with the past and show its sincerity towards peace," it said. This comes amid reports that Japan is planning a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong-un.
summary: जापान को तब तक नजरअंदाज करेगा जब तक वह सैन्य अभ्यास नहीं कर देता: एन कोरिया

text: In a move aimed at boosting the sales of domestic products amid US sanctions, Iran's Ministry of Industry, Mine and Trade has banned the import of 1,400 items. Managing Director of Iran's Commerce Services of Trade Development Organisation, Farhad Noori, said that all the banned items have their similar domestic alternatives, adding that "we expect people to support domestic products".
summary: ईरान घरेलू उत्पादों का समर्थन करने के लिए 1,400 वस्तुओं के आयात पर प्रतिबंध लगाता है

text: India's richest person Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Industries is considering an Initial Public Offering (IPO) for Reliance Jio in the next 2-3 years, as per reports. Reliance is reportedly planning to list the telecom unit after its consumer business overtakes its energy business in terms of revenue. Reliance's consumer businesses include Jio, Reliance Digital, Reliance Fresh among others.
summary: 3 साल में आईपीओ के लिए जा सकते हैं मुकेश अंबानी की रिलायंस जियो

text: Talking about making "good contacts" in Bollywood, Sana Khan said, "Honestly, whether it's Salman (Khan) or anyone else, I don't know how good contacts are made." "I just feel I could have made some stronger bonds when I had the chance," she added. Sana further said, "But I also believe just by being friends with superstars...you don't become like them."
summary: सलमान हों या कोई भी, संपर्क बनाना नहीं जानते: सना

text: Actress Deepika Padukone will be starring in the remake of a film that starred late actress Sridevi, as per reports. "The original Sridevi film was made by a producer from the South and helmed by a Bollywood director," stated reports. The original film was reportedly made around four decades ago.
summary: श्रीदेवी की फिल्म के रीमेक में दीपिका

text: Meituan Dianping, world's fourth-most valuable tech startup, has revealed a net loss of $2.9 billion for 2017, ahead of its Hong Kong initial public offering (IPO). However, the startup more than doubled its revenue to $5.1 billion for the same period. While Meituan did not disclose its objectives, it is reportedly aiming to raise $4-6 billion at $60-billion valuation.
summary: चीनी टेक स्टार्टअप Meituan ने IPO के आगे $ 3 bn नुकसान का खुलासा किया

text: Technology giant Google is reportedly planning to launch its e-commerce platform in the Indian market later this year. Reports further suggested that Google's Vice President of Product Management Caesar Sengupta is likely to head the e-commerce unit for the company in India. The development comes days after Google invested $550 million in Chinese e-commerce firm JD.com.
summary: Google भारत इस साल के अंत में अपना ई-कॉम प्लेटफॉर्म लॉन्च कर सकता है

text: JD(U) spokesperson Sanjay Singh on Monday said that there is a big difference between 2014 and 2019 and BJP knows it will not be able to get through in Bihar without CM Nitish Kumar. "If the BJP does not need the help of its alliance partners, then it can fight on all 40 seats alone," he added.
summary: बिहार में बीजेपी को नहीं पता नीतीश के बिना: JD (U)

text: After External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj liked several posts trolling her on Twitter, the Congress replied, "We applaud your decision to call out the heinous trolls of your own party." The BJP leader was being trolled over the transfer of a passport officer who had allegedly humiliated an interfaith couple in Lucknow. "I am honoured with some tweets," she wrote.
summary: बीजेपी को ट्रोल कहने के लिए तालियां बजाओ: स्वराज को कांग्रेस

text: Madhya Pradesh National Cow Service Corps President Mehrunisa Khan has alleged that she has been receiving death threats from outsiders as well as her family for running a cow shelter. Adding that she will continue working despite the threats, Khan said, "I do not know how working for animals, who cannot even say anything is ruining their reputation."
summary: गाय के आश्रय के लिए मुस्लिम महिला का परिवार उसे धमकी देता है

text: During a bilateral meet with Seychelles' President Danny Faure in India, PM Narendra Modi on Monday announced that India has given $100 million to Seychelles on credit for its defence sector. "India and Seychelles are major strategic partners...and share the geo-strategic vision to maintain the peace, security and stability in the Indian Ocean," PM Modi added.
summary: सेशेल्स को रक्षा के लिए $ 100 मिलियन डॉलर दिए गए हैं: पीएम

text: Villagers in Chhattisgarh's Dantewada district have claimed that Naxals threatened to kill them if one member from each family did not join them. "We are really scared of them. We don't know what to do next," a villager said. However, police denied having information about such threats and said perhaps Naxals were trying to create psychological pressure among the masses.
summary: छत्तीसगढ़ में नक्सली मांग करते हैं कि प्रति परिवार 1 सदस्य उनका साथ दे

text: BJP MLA KG Bopaiah has said that the party leaders want the Haj Bhavan in Bengaluru to be named after late President APJ Abdul Kalam and not Tipu Sultan, an 18th century ruler. He added that he feared communal clashes would break out if the state government renames Haj Bhavan after Tipu Sultan.
summary: कलाम के बाद नाम बल्लू हज भवन, न कि टीपू सुल्तान: भाजपा विधायक

text: Parliament's Monsoon Session will be held from July 18 to August 10, Parliamentary Affairs Minister Ananth Kumar announced on Monday. The last parliamentary session held in April was the least productive since 2000, with a total of nearly 250 working hours getting wasted. While only five bills were passed in the Lok Sabha, one was cleared in the Rajya Sabha.
summary: संसद का मानसून सत्र 18 जुलाई से 10 अगस्त तक होगा

text: An accountancy firm in London, which allegedly has links to companies named in the Panama Papers leak, audited the finances for Nirav Modi's UK business, reports said. The firm admitted to auditing Nirav Modi Limited but denied having any connection with the diamond jeweller. The firm's name appeared in Panama Papers leak by mistake, its owner claimed.
summary: ब्रिटेन में नीरव मोदी फर्म के ऑडिटर पनामा पेपर्स से जुड़े थे

text: The Jammu & Kashmir police has said that Rising Kashmir Editor Shujaat Bukhari was killed by terrorists on instructions from Pakistan. Bukhari was killed to send a message to other journalists to not voice anything other than Pakistan's official line on Kashmir, police said. "We have clear-cut investigation leads to the accused. The killers have been identified," police added.
summary: पाकिस्तान से आदेश पर राइजिंग कश्मीर एडिटर की हत्या: जम्मू-कश्मीर पुलिस

text: The official trailer of Akshay Kumar starrer 'Gold', a film on India's first Olympic medal as a free nation, has been released. The film will mark the Bollywood debut of television actress Mouni Roy, and will also star Amit Sadh, Kunal Kapoor, Vineet Singh and Sunny Kaushal. Directed by Reema Kagti, 'Gold' is scheduled to release on August 15.
summary: अक्षय कुमार स्टारर 'गोल्ड' का ट्रेलर रिलीज़

text: A Class 12 student from Delhi, who failed the CBSE boards after scoring 16 in English, got her score changed to 80 after re-evaluation. Another student's 0 marks in Class 10 Urdu exam were changed to 37, while Social Science marks of one student were changed from 12 to 59. The board has reportedly received 10,000 re-evaluation requests this year.
summary: CBSE कक्षा 12 के छात्र को अंग्रेजी में 16, सत्यापन के बाद 80 अंक मिले

text: Veteran actress Rekha performed at the 2018 International Indian Film Academy (IIFA) Awards in Bangkok, 20 years after her last performance at the award ceremony. "We couldn't be more honoured to have her," tweeted the official page of IIFA while sharing a video of her performance. She danced to songs like 'Salaam-e-Ishq Meri Jaan' and 'In Aankhon Ki Masti'.
summary: रेखा 20 साल बाद IIFA अवार्ड समारोह में प्रस्तुति देती हैं

text: Actress Urvashi Rautela has revealed that she wore a gown weighing 80 kilogram at the 2018 International Indian Film Academy (IIFA) Awards in Bangkok. "I guess I'm gonna faint tonight wearing this 80 kg beautiful gown," wrote Urvashi while sharing a photo. The beige embellished gown has been designed by fashion designer Archana Kochhar.
summary: उर्वशी रौतेला ने IIFA अवार्ड्स 2018 में 80 किलो वजन का गाउन पहना था

text: Talking about reports that Haryanvi singer and dancer Sapna Choudhary will campaign for the Congress, Karnal BJP MP Ashwini Kumar Chopra said, "Yeh (Congress) ko dekhna hai ki thumke lagane hain ya chunav jeetna hai." Recently, Choudhary had said, "Sonia Ji and Congress have done a lot of work for the country, I am very impressed with them."
summary: थुम्का लागो या चुनव जेएतो: सप ऑन में चुनाव प्रचार के लिए सांसद

text: The Pakistan Cricket Board has summoned wicketkeeper-batsman Umar Akmal after he claimed that he has had offers to miss World Cup matches against India. The 28-year-old said he was once offered $200,000 for missing two deliveries in a match. As per the rules, not reporting any approaches made to a player for fixing matches is also a punishable offence.
summary: उमर अकमल ने स्पॉट फिक्सिंग के दावों पर पीसीबी से जवाब-तलब किया

text: A compound wall of an under-construction building in Lloyds Estate in Mumbai's Wadala collapsed on Monday amid heavy rain. Around 15 cars are stuck in debris after the collapse and at least seven are reported to be damaged. While no casualties have been reported in the incident so far, fire brigade officers are rescuing residents trapped inside the building.
summary: भारी बारिश के बीच मुंबई में दीवार ढह गई, 15 कारें फंस गईं

text: An attempt to rape was allegedly made on a 15-year-old girl at the rooftop of Gorakhpur's BRD Hospital recently. The girl had come looking for a job when one of the accused took her to the rooftop on pretext of charging her phone. Three others joined him in the attempt, and fled when the girl made noise.
summary: गोरखपुर के बीआरडी अस्पताल में नाबालिग से बलात्कार का प्रयास

text: Road traffic on Santa Cruz division and Khar subway was blocked due to waterlogging and train services on the western railway were delayed amid heavy rains in Mumbai on Monday. Two people were reported dead and five were injured after a tree fell on them at MG Road while seven cars were damaged after a compound wall collapsed in Wadala.
summary: मुंबई यातायात बाधित, भारी बारिश के कारण ट्रेनें विलंबित

text: A video of an attempt to assassinate Zimbabwean President Emmerson Mnangagwa during an election campaign rally last week has surfaced online. Joking that he is used to evading assassination, Mnangagwa had said the explosion went off a "few inches away from me, but it is not my time". He further said the "cowardly act" won't disrupt the upcoming presidential polls.
summary: जिंबाब्वे प्रेज़ की हत्या की कोशिश कैमरे पर कैद हुई

text: US clothing company Wildfang took a jibe at First Lady Melania Trump by selling jackets bearing the slogan "I really care, don't you?" in response to the "I really don't care" jacket that she wore before meeting migrant children. All proceeds from the jackets, selling for $98 each, will be donated to a Texas-based refugee and immigrant advocacy group.
summary: अमेरिकी ब्रांड मेलानिया ट्रम्प को 'आई रियली केयर' जैकेट के साथ लुभाती है

text: Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte last week slammed the concept of original sin in the Bible and called God "stupid". Questioning God's logic in the Biblical creation story of Adam and Eve, Duterte said, "Adam ate it (the forbidden fruit)Ã¢ÂÂ¦then malice was born. Who is this stupid God? That son of a b**ch is stupid if that's the case."
summary: फिलीपीन के राष्ट्रपति रोड्रिगो दुतेर्ते ने भगवान को 'बेवकूफ' कहा

text: A user claimed that Amazon's digital assistant Alexa-powered smart speaker scared him by saying, "Every time I close my eyes all I see is people dying" without activation. Further, when the user asked to repeat the statement, Alexa said that it did not understand. Last year, Alexa alerted the New Mexico police after hearing the owner threatening his girlfriend.
summary: अमेजन के एलेक्सा ने यूजर्स को डराया, 'ऑल आई वॉच इज देइंग इज डाइंग'

text: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath on Sunday said that Congress President Rahul Gandhi remembers temples only during elections. Adding that Gandhi behaves like a "yuvraj (prince)", the Chief Minister said, "Four generations of Rahul's family have never worn a janeu (sacred thread worn by Hindus), but at the time of elections, he shows his janeu."

text: Makkal Needhi Maiam chief Kamal Haasan said that he is inspired by Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal even though they are not similar. He added that he looks up to Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan and praised Andhra Pradesh CM Chandrababu Naidu for "doing a different kind of good". He further stated that his party is centrist and open to ideas.
summary: हम समान नहीं हैं लेकिन मैं केजरीवाल से प्रेरित हूं: कमल हासन

text: A retired serviceman in Jammu and Kashmir has alleged BJP MLA Gagan Bhagat kidnapped his daughter, who is a student at a university in Punjab. However, the daughter refuted the allegation she was kidnapped, claiming her parents are forcing her into marriage. Calling the MLA a "good person", she said, "My family is supporter of PDP...may be that's the reason..."

text: Congress MLA Rajanish Singh has been caught on camera tying Madhya Pradesh Congress President Kamal Nath's shoelaces in Seoni. Reacting to the incident, Singh said the gesture was a way of showing respect to the state Congress President. "He (Kamal Nath) is like a father figure to me...I respect him a lot," the MLA added.
summary: कांग्रेस विधायक ने मध्यप्रदेश पार्टी प्रमुख का किया शिलान्यास

text: The Delhi University on Sunday released its second cut-off list for undergraduate courses, with SRCC having a cut-off of 98.25% for Economics Honours and 97.37% for BCom Honours. Lady Shri Ram College, Hindu College and Miranda House have closed admissions for several BA courses. Over 25% of the 56,000 seats at the university were filled after the first cut-off.
summary: DU ने दूसरी कट-ऑफ, SRCC में अर्थशास्त्र के लिए 98.25% जारी की

text: One person died after a fire broke out at the Kothari House building in Mumbai's Girgaon on Sunday. Eight fire tenders were rushed to the spot and the fire has now been brought under control. The fire erupted at the second and third floors of the building and a wooden staircase connecting the floors collapsed.
summary: मुंबई गिरगांव में इमारत में आग लगने से एक की मौत हो गई

text: A 33-year-old school teacher received 1,001 saplings of fruit-bearing plants as 'dowry' on his wedding in Odisha's Kendrapara. Sarojkanta Biswal requested his father-in-law to gift him the saplings after he insisted on giving dowry to the groom. Biswal, who distributed the saplings among the wedding guests, said it was his dream to celebrate his marriage "in the greenest possible way".
summary: ओडिशा स्कूल के शिक्षक को दहेज के रूप में मिले 1,001 पौधे

text: The Supreme Court has asked a Maharashtra medical college to pay Ã¢ÂÂ¹20 lakh each to 19 students for wrongfully denying them admission six years ago. The college had admitted less meritorious students in place of deserving candidates for profit motives. The SC set aside the Bombay High Court's order, which endorsed the withdrawal of government recognition to the college.

text: A couple was allegedly harassed by co-passengers in a Kolkata train and the woman was shamed for wearing jeans and a t-shirt. In a Facebook post, the woman claimed that one passenger told them to "go home and sit on each other's lap". The passenger also told them that a previous case of harassment had happened because of "their generation".

text: The Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams (TTD), accused of stealing ornaments from Lord Venkateswara temple in Andhra, has decided to exhibit the jewellery to end the controversy. The jewellery will be put on display for the media on June 28. text: Upset after his wife gave birth to their sixth daughter in a row, a man allegedly stabbed his four-day-old baby girl with a knife three times in Gujarat. The infant was rushed to a hospital in a critical condition where she succumbed to her injuries. The accused was caught while trying to run away after his wife created a commotion.

text: Villagers in Assam's Nagaon allegedly thrashed a couple the entire night on Saturday, claiming they were cheating on their respective spouses by having a relationship. The woman's head was shaved by the women in the village and the couple's clothes were torn, police said. The victims were badly injured and admitted to a hospital after police rushed to the spot.

text: Calling for the immediate deportation of migrants caught entering the US illegally, President Donald Trump has said, "We cannot allow all of these people to invade our country." text: Sridevi has been honoured with the best actress award posthumously for 'Mom' while Irrfan Khan won best actor for 'Hindi Medium' at this year's International Indian Film Academy (IIFA) Awards in Bangkok. text: The Yo-Yo test evaluates an athlete's aerobic endurance fitness, requiring him to run between two lines 20 metres apart and turn when signalled by beeps. After every minute, the pace gets quicker and he's given two more beeps to catch up on not reaching the line in time. The test is stopped when he fails to catch up with pace.

text: Aamir Khan and Alia Bhatt will star together for the first time in an upcoming film as the spiritual leader Osho or Bhagwan Rajneesh and his secretary Ma Anand Sheela, as per reports. Filmmaker Shakun Batra will reportedly be directing the film. Earlier, Alia starred in Shakun's 2016 directorial 'Kapoor & Sons'.

text: Douglas Moreton, an England football fan, missed his country's biggest-ever World Cup victory on Sunday as he had forgotten to take England-Panama match ticket from his drawer at home in Bristol. A British news editor managed to arrange a ticket for Douglas, who travelled over 3,000 kilometres for the match in Russia, but revealed the latter failed to collect it.

text: Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar mistook Mandeep Singh for former captain Sardar Singh in a tweet congratulating Indian hockey team on their victory against Argentina in the Champions Trophy. text: Recep Tayyip ErdoÃÂan was on Sunday re-elected as the Turkish President, extending his 15-year grip on power. text: Saudi Arabia allowing its women to drive could add as much as $90 billion to economic output by 2030, according to Bloomberg. text: Actor Vicky Kaushal, who will be playing the role of Sanjay Dutt's best friend in the biopic 'Sanju', has said that Dutt has seen the best and worst in life and has not seen normalcy. text: The Singapore government on Sunday revealed that it spent over Ã¢ÂÂ¹81 crore on hosting the summit between US President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un. text: Tom Holland took to Instagram to reveal the title of 'Spider-Man: Homecoming' sequel as 'Spider-Man: Far From Home'. The video showed Tom apologising to fans for not having any big announcements to make about the sequel, then he flipped his tablet where 'Spider-Man: Far From Home' was written. text: Talking about the Kerala High Court's verdict on 'Grihalakshmi' magazine cover which showed her breastfeeding a baby, model Gilu Joseph said, "Personally, I'm much more than my body." "I'm really happy with the judgement because we live in a society where art is not always appreciated in...right sense," she added. The court refused to categorise the magazine cover as obscene.

text: Arjun Kapoor, who starred opposite Parineeti Chopra in his debut film 'Ishaqzaade', said, "I never looked at it (Parineeti's role) as 'If hers is better or mine is better'." text: Actress Jacqueline Fernandez's debut English film 'Definition of Fear' will be releasing in August in India. Jacqueline has a lead role in the film which has been directed by documentary filmmaker James Simpson. "I'm very proud of Definition of Fear and also very excited for its release," said the actress. text: Poland became the first European side to be eliminated from the 2018 FIFA World Cup after losing 0-3 to Colombia on Sunday. Out of the 14 European sides participating in the World Cup, five have confirmed their spot in the second round (Round of 16). Further, eight of the 32 participating nations have been eliminated from the tournament so far.

text: A video of Senegal football team players dancing and singing during official training ahead of their 2018 FIFA World Cup match against Japan has surfaced online. Reacting to the video, a user tweeted, "I don't even care about football/soccer, but I'm a diehard Senegal fan now! What joy!" Senegal had beaten Poland 2-1 in their first match of the tournament.

text: Japan came from behind twice to salvage a 2-2 draw against Senegal in a Group H fixture at the 2018 FIFA World Cup on Sunday. The match witnessed midfielder 32-year-old Keisuke Honda become the first Japanese player to score in three different World Cup editions. Both Japan and Senegal have now accumulated four points from two matches.

text: England posted a one-wicket victory in the fifth ODI on Sunday to register their first-ever 5-0 series whitewash over Australia in ODI cricket. Wicketkeeper-batsman Jos Buttler slammed an unbeaten 110 off 122 balls to help England score 208/9 despite being 114/8 at one stage. England have now won nine of the ten ODIs they have played against Australia in 2018.
summary: इंग्लैंड ने ऑस्ट्रेलिया पर अपना पहला 5-0 से एकदिवसीय सफेदी पोस्ट किया

text: American sprinter Noah Lyles ran the fastest 100-metre race of the year to clinch the US national title in Des Moines, Iowa. The 20-year-old Florida-born athlete clocked 9.88 seconds in the final, after equalling Mike Rodgers' world-leading time of 2018 of 9.89 seconds in the semi-finals. Lyles also holds the joint-quickest time of 2018 in 200m, clocking 19.69 last month.
summary: 20 वर्षीय यूएस स्प्रिंटर 2018 का सबसे तेज 100 मीटर 9.88 सेकेंड में चलता है

text: Google has announced a new feature for its Chrome browser that would allow users to access the web without a constant internet connection on Android devices. The update will automatically download articles recommended to users based on interests and location. The feature will be rolled out to 100 countries with limited access to data, including India, Nigeria, Indonesia, and Brazil.
summary: Chrome उपयोगकर्ताओं को इंटरनेट के बिना वेब सर्फ करने देने के लिए Google

text: Yoga Guru Ramdev has stated it will take another two months to set up Patanjali's messaging app 'Kimbho', which was launched in May as a rival to WhatsApp. Adding that preparations are currently underway, he also said, "We need to look into...handling large user traffic." A day after Kimbho was launched, it was pulled down following alleged privacy concerns.
summary: मैसेजिंग ऐप Kimbho: रामदेव को सेट करने के लिए 2 महीने और चाहिए

text: Microsoft Co-founder Bill Gates is investing $4 million in genetically-modified mosquitoes to eradicate malaria which is spread by female mosquito bites. The research, conducted by UK-based company Oxitec, involves releasing the modified male mosquitoes to mate with female mosquitoes. The male will pass on a self-limiting gene, which will kill their female offspring before reaching maturity.
summary: मलेरिया उन्मूलन के लिए संशोधित मच्छरों में गेट्स $ 4mn पंप करता है

text: After BJP ended its alliance with PDP in Jammu and Kashmir, former CM Mehbooba Mufti said, "Allegations of discrimination against Jammu and Ladakh have no basis in reality." The valley needed "focused attention" as it has been in turmoil for a long time, she added. Accusing BJP of levelling false charges against PDP, Mufti said BJP "disowned its own initiative".

text: Clashes broke out at a wedding in Uttar Pradesh's Vikrampur area after the organisers ran out of plates for serving food to the wedding guests, police said on Sunday. While four people were injured in the altercation, a 20-year-old victim succumbed to his injuries on his way to the hospital. Police have launched a probe into the incident.
summary: प्लेटों की कमी को लेकर यूपी में हुई झड़प के बाद 1 की मौत

text: The West Bengal government has applied for a Geographical Indication (GI) tag for Kohitur mango, which was sold for Ã¢ÂÂ¹1,500 a piece last season. text: In his blog series on the Emergency, union minister Arun Jaitley said he was the "first Satyagrahi" against the Emergency as he organised a protest the morning after the decision was announced. text: Security forces in Jammu and Kashmir killed two Lashkar-e-Taiba militants, including the terror outfit's divisional commander Shakoor Dar, police said on Sunday. Twelve protestors were injured in clashes that followed the encounter and internet services were suspended in Kulgam.

text: US State Secretary Mike Pompeo praised Infosys for its plans to create 10,000 American jobs in the next two years. text: Pakistan's wicketkeeper-batsman Umar Akmal revealed he was offered money to sit out of the India-Pakistan match in the 2015 World Cup but he refused. text: Delhi Police on Sunday arrested Army Major Nikhil Handa for allegedly murdering his colleague Major Amit Dwivedi's wife Shailja and said that Handa wanted to marry her. text: Harry Potter series author JK Rowling has sent gifts along with a personalised letter to a 12-year-old Kashmiri fan Kulsum, who wrote a heartwarming note to her in April this year. text: Mahindra Group's Chairman Anand Mahindra on Sunday took to Twitter to share a video of a 'desi jugad' water park, which he said was probably shot in Punjab. text: Saudi Arabia's businesswoman Aseel Al-Hamad on Sunday drove a Formula One racecar to mark the end of 60-year-old women's driving ban in the country. text: The Maharashtra plastic ban will result in revenue loss of up to Ã¢ÂÂ¹15,000 crore and will cost nearly 3 lakh jobs, the Plastic Bags Manufacturers Association of India has claimed. text: Actor Bobby Deol who made a comeback in Bollywood with 'Race 3' after four years, blames himself for his absence from the film industry. "I had kind of given up. I felt demotivated, disheartened but looking around at my family I realised I cannot let them down," he added. He further said that he didn't realise the competition had increased.  n

text: Actor Saif Ali Khan has said that one cannot benefit from someone else's failure. "You just have to challenge yourself...The only person who can help you is you," he added.
