text: After a man tweeted that he and his wife were booked in separate batches for Kailash Mansarovar Yatra, External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj tweeted, "The computer is guilty of separating you." The 69-year-old man had sought help claiming that he and his wife cannot travel separately. The minister assured him that they will be sent together in the same batch.
summary: आपको अलग करने का दोषी कंप्यूटर: तीर्थ युगल को स्वराज

text: The bodies of 20 Egyptian Christians beheaded in Libya's Sirte by Islamic State in 2015 were flown back to their home country on Monday. Their bodies were recovered in October last year after the area where they were buried was recaptured from the militant group. The head of Egypt's Coptic Church, Pope Tawadros II, received the bodies at the airport.
summary: लीबिया ने मिस्र में 20 सिर काटे गए ईसाईयों के शव सौंपे

text: US President Donald Trump has slammed those leaking information out of the White House, calling them "traitors" and "cowards". "We will find out who they are!" Trump added. This comes after a staffer revealed that a White House aide mocked cancer-stricken US Senator John McCain's opposition to CIA director nominee Gina Haspel, saying "it doesn't matter" because "he's dying anyway".
summary: अमेरिकी राष्ट्रपति ट्रम्प ने व्हाइट हाउस के लीक करने वालों को 'देशद्रोही' कहा

text: The BJP has crossed the halfway mark, leading in 112 seats in the ongoing Karnataka Assembly elections for 222 electoral constituencies. While the Congress is leading in 56 seats, the JD(S) has secured a lead in 38 seats. The voting for two constituencies was postponed due to a candidate's demise in Jayanagar and the voter-ID row in RR Nagar.
summary: बीजेपी आधे रास्ते से आगे बढ़ गई, केतका चुनाव में 112 सीटों पर आगे

text: The Supreme Court has acquitted cricketer-turned-politician Navjot Singh Sidhu of culpable homicide not amounting to murder in the 1988 road rage case, while convicting him of voluntarily causing hurt. Sidhu was accused of hitting a 65-year-old man following an altercation that led to his death. He has been fined Ã¢ÂÂ¹1,000 for causing injury to the victim, without any jail term.
summary: 1988 के रोड रेज मामले में सिद्धू को दोषी ठहराया गया

text: Filmmaker Karan Johar charged Ã¢ÂÂ¹11 to star in Anurag Kashyap directorial 'Bombay Velvet', which released on May 15, 2015. "I came as a cheap actor and didn't add to the film's budget," Johar had jokingly said in an old interview. He had added, "I took the role because I thought nobody will offer me a negative role in my life."
summary: जौहर ने फिल्म 'बॉम्बे वेलवेट' में अभिनय करने के लिए har ¢ 11 का आरोप लगाया

text: Early trends in the counting of votes in Karnataka Assembly elections show CM candidates of BJP, Congress and JD(S) leading from their constituencies. While BJP candidate BS Yeddyurappa is leading with a margin of 7,818 votes in Shikaripura, Congress' Siddaramaiah has a lead of 169 votes in Badami. JD(S) candidate HD Kumaraswamy is ahead with 11,585 votes in Ramanagaram.
summary: प्रमुख दलों के सीएम उम्मीदवार शुरुआती रुझानों में आगे हैं

text: On being asked if Congress would ally with JD(S) to form the government in Karnataka, Congress leader Ashok Gehlot said, "Yes all options are open." Meanwhile, early trends in the counting of votes show Congress leading in 65 seats and JD(S) in 38 while the BJP is ahead in 111 seats in the 224-member Assembly.
summary: कर्नाटक में जेडी (एस) के साथ गठबंधन के लिए खुला: कांग्रेस

text: In a first, CBSE has conducted separate 10th and 12th board exams for six students who were representing the country in international sports championships. Of them, 15-year-old shooter Anish Bhanwala won gold at Commonwealth Games, while Vijayawada's K Venkatadri bagged 3 silvers and Patiala's Sehajpreet won gold at international archery championships among others.
summary: CWG स्वर्ण विजेता, 5 अन्य के लिए अलग बोर्ड परीक्षा आयोजित की गई

text: Google is under investigation in Australia following claims that it collects data from Android users, who unknowingly pay their telecom service providers for gigabytes consumed during the harvesting. The data harvested includes users' location and detailed information on their searches, reports said. A Google spokesperson, however, said the company has users' permission to collect data.
summary: उपयोगकर्ता अनजाने में Google को डेटा भेजने के लिए भुगतान कर रहे हैं: रिपोर्ट

text: Elon Musk on Monday responded to reports claiming that Tesla compromised on Autopilot safeguards and said, "This is false." According to a report by Wall Street Journal, Tesla rejected the idea to add safeguards like eye-tracking sensors into its Autopilot system because it cost too much. Calling the report "ridiculous", Musk tweeted, "Eyetracking rejected for being ineffective, not for cost."
summary: मस्क ने दावा किया कि टेस्ला ने ऑटोपायलट पर समझौता किया

text: Credit rating agency Moody's has said it expects that Flipkart will continue to generate losses for the next few years. However, it added Walmart's acquisition of 77% stake in Flipkart is 'credit positive'. "Our credit-positive view is based on India's compelling features, including its 1.2 billion residents and an economy that generates more than 7% annual GDP growth," Moody's said.
summary: फ्लिपकार्ट अगले कुछ वर्षों के लिए नुकसान उत्पन्न करेगा: मूडीज

text: Flipkart will repurchase up to 30% of its former employees' ESOPs (Employee stock ownership plan) at Ã¢ÂÂ¹8,400-8,700 share price, the company has said. Current employees will reportedly be allowed to liquidate 50% of their vested ESOPs during the first year after Flipkart-Walmart deal and 25% in the second and third year. Walmart is set to acquire 77% Flipkart stake.
summary: फ्लिपकार्ट के पूर्व कर्मचारी अपने ESOP की 30% बिक्री कर सकते हैं

text: American scientists claim to have successfully transplanted memories by transferring genetic information called RNA from one sea snail into another. The team transplanted RNA from snails who were given electric shocks and contracted their gills in a defensive action. The snails which received the RNA showed the same behaviour, suggesting the "memory" of the electrical shocks had been transplanted.
summary: वैज्ञानिकों ने memories यादों को एक घोंघे से दूसरे में प्रतिरोपित ’किया

text: The government will wait for concrete evidence before taking any action against the heads of state-owned lenders Syndicate Bank and Indian Bank, Financial Services Secretary Rajiv Kumar has said. "We will not take any action based on hearsay," Kumar added. Both the executives were booked in a Ã¢ÂÂ¹600-crore loan fraud case involving the companies of former Aircel promoter C Sivasankaran.
summary: साक्ष्य के बिना बैंक प्रमुखों के खिलाफ कार्रवाई नहीं होगी: सरकार

text: Minister of State for Finance Shiv Pratap Shukla has said that there is no proposal under the government's consideration to ban the Ã¢ÂÂ¹2,000 banknotes. The Ã¢ÂÂ¹2,000 notes were introduced after demonetisation in November 2016. Shukla further said that Ã¢ÂÂ¹500 notes are circulated in adequate numbers in the wake of the currency crunch in various states in the past few months.
summary: Plans to2,000 बैंकनोट को स्क्रैप करने की कोई योजना नहीं: MoS Finance

text: Top officials of PNB "misrepresented" the factual position on Letters of Undertaking (LoUs) to the RBI, according to a CBI chargesheet. PNB also allegedly ignored the central bank's warnings when credit facilities worth over $2 billion were fraudulently cleared by its branch in Mumbai. The chargesheet named 22 persons including Nirav Modi, his brother, and former PNB CEO Usha Ananthasubramanian.
summary: पीएनबी ने LoUs से RBI को तथ्यात्मक स्थिति को गलत बताया: CBI

text: US First Lady Melania Trump on Monday underwent a surgery at the Walter Reed National Military Medical Centre in Maryland to treat what the White House called a "benign kidney condition". The White House said that the procedure was successful and there were no complications. The 48-year-old will remain at the medical facility for rest of the week.
summary: यूएस फर्स्ट लेडी मेलानिया ट्रम्प ने गुर्दे की सर्जरी के लिए अस्पताल में भर्ती कराया

text: Canada will add a third gender option to its future government surveys including the 2021 census paving the way for an overhauled census. "We want to make sure all Canadians can identify themselves within the census," Laurent Martel, Director of demography at Statistics Canada said. Last week, Canada's largest province Ontario issued its first non-binary birth certificate.
summary: सरकारी सर्वेक्षणों में तीसरा लिंग विकल्प जोड़ने के लिए कनाडा

text: India's largest telecom operator Bharti Airtel completed the acquisition of the Indian arm of Telenor Communications on Monday. The Sunil Mittal-led company will begin integrating Telenor's operations across seven circles and all its customers will be transitioned to the Airtel network seamlessly. Following the deal, Airtel's mobile subscriber base in India now stands at over 33 crore.
summary: भारती एयरटेल ने टेलीनॉर इंडिया का अधिग्रहण पूरा किया

text: Actress Margot Kidder, best known for playing the role of Lois Lane in the Superman film franchise of the 1970s and 1980s, passed away on Sunday at the age of 69. An autopsy will be performed to determine the cause of her death. Margot, who suffered from a car accident in 1990, had experienced long-term mental health issues.
summary: सुपरमैन फिल्म में लोइस लेन को चित्रित करने वाली अभिनेत्री का निधन

text: A motion poster introducing Taapsee Pannu's character from the upcoming film 'Soorma' has been released. Sharing the video on social media, Taapsee wrote, "For my undying love for sports and my country... Meet Harpreet aka Preet, a person who believes in pushing boundaries on as well as off the field!" Directed by Shaad Ali, 'Soorma' will release on July 13.
summary: मोशन पोस्टर में सोएर्मा से तापेसी के चरित्र का परिचय दिया गया

text: The Election Commission has dismissed media reports that BJP workers were found with 1,000 postal ballot covers at a hotel in Karnataka's Badami ahead of the state polls. The EC stated that it went to the hotel with the police and found nothing at the spot. Notably, Congress' CM candidate Siddaramaiah is contesting from the Badami seat.
summary: चुनाव आयोग ने K'taka होटल में 1000 डाक मतपत्रों के दावे को खारिज कर दिया

text: After BJP took a lead in the Karnataka Assembly elections on Tuesday, former Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah tweeted, "Et tu Karnataka." Abdullah was referring to Shakespeare's tragedy 'Julius Caeser', in which the Roman leader was killed by his friend Brutus. As he is stabbed, Caeser says, "Et tu, Brute?", which means "Even you, Brutus?"
summary: Et tu Karnataka: बीजेपी के चुनावों के बाद उमर अब्दुल्ला

text: Around a dozen Google employees have reportedly resigned from the company over the company's involvement in an artificial intelligence (AI) drone program for the US military. Earlier, over 3,100 employees signed a petition urging the company's CEO Sundar Pichai to end Google's participation in the project. Those who resigned and the petitioners claim the project runs contrary to Google's ethos.
summary: Google के कर्मचारियों ने सैन्य ड्रोन AI प्रोजेक्ट को छोड़ दिया: रिपोर्ट

text: Notification detecting app called WhatsRemoved developed by Development Colors allows users to read WhatsApp messages even after they have been deleted. It keeps a tab on WhatsApp messages through the smartphone's notification system and copies incoming WhatsApp messages. Users can enable "Notification Listener Service" and read deleted messages straight from the app's notification bar.
summary: ऐप उपयोगकर्ताओं को हटाए गए व्हाट्सएप संदेशों को पढ़ने देता है

text: Facebook has added a feature that allows users to report conversations in Messenger on mobile that violate its Community Standards. Earlier, users could only report activity in Messenger via Facebook reporting tools or Messenger web. The feature can be accessed by tapping the name of the person with whom the user is conversing and then scrolling to 'Something's Wrong'.
summary: फेसबुक अब उपयोगकर्ताओं को मैसेंजर में बातचीत की रिपोर्ट करने देता है

text: The Supreme Court has agreed to hear a plea seeking prosecution of Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath in a 2007 hate speech case. Earlier, a plea against Adityanath in the case was quashed by the Allahabad High Court. It was alleged that provocative speech by Adityanath had sparked riots in Gorakhpur during a Muharram procession.
summary: 2007 के नफरत भरे भाषण मामले में यूपी सीएम योगी के खिलाफ सुनवाई के लिए SC

text: Around 5,000 farmers in Gujarat have sought mass euthanasia if the government does not return their land acquired by a state-owned mining company. The farmers claimed the Gujarat Power Corporation Limited had violated rules by not starting work on the land within five years of acquisition. They demand that the company either return their land or reacquire it.
summary: 5,000 गुजरात के किसानों को सरकारी जमीन के सौदे के लिए सामूहिक इच्छामृत्यु चाहिए

text: A petition was filed in the Lahore High Court on Monday to register a treason case against former Pakistani Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif following his remarks on 26/11 Mumbai terror attacks. The petition, filed by political party Pakistan Awami Tehreek's Secretary General Khurram Nawaz Gandapur, stated that Sharif's remarks were against national security and state institutions.
summary: पाकिस्तान में नवाज शरीफ के खिलाफ देशद्रोह के लिए याचिका दायर

text: nLodha Group, India's No.1 real estate developer (*by residential sales for FY 17 & the 9 month period ended 31st December '17), through its towering vision of 'Building a Better Life' is transforming the way people live. Its latest ad film stars Akshay Kumar telling users to 'Come home to the best. Come home to Lodha'.nn
summary: अक्षय कुमार IndiaÃ Â Â € s ™ s नंबर 1 रियल एस्टेट डेवलपर * का नया चेहरा है

text: nEarly trends in the counting of votes in Karnataka Assembly elections show that the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) is leading in 76 seats, while Congress is leading in 38. It also shows Independent candidates ahead in 26 with Janata Dal (Secular) (JD(S)) leading in two of the constituencies. Polling was held on Saturday for 222 of Karnataka's 224-member Assembly.
summary: शुरुआती रुझानों में बीजेपी 76 सीटों पर आगे चल रही है, कांग्टाका में 38 सीटों पर

text: Born on May 15, 1859, French scientist Pierre Curie won the 1903 Nobel Prize in Physics with his wife Marie Curie for isolating the previously unknown radioactive elements radium and polonium. The Curies had two daughters, IrÃÂ¨ne and ÃÂve. IrÃÂ¨ne continued the family tradition of scientific research and received the 1935 Chemistry Nobel with her husband Frederic Joliot.
summary: पियरे क्यूरी, पत्नी, बेटी, दामाद सभी ने नोबेल पुरस्कार जीता

text: Facebook data of over 3 million people who took a personality quiz was reportedly published on a website accessible to unauthorised parties. The data, gathered by 'myPersonality' quiz app, included users' age, gender, location, and relationship status. In total, 280 people were given access, including employees of Facebook and other technology companies, according to the report.
summary: 3 mn फेसबुक उपयोगकर्ताओं का डेटा प्रश्नोत्तरी ऐप के माध्यम से उजागर: रिपोर्ट

text: In light of the data scandal surrounding Facebook, the company has suspended 200 apps that failed its audit. The suspensions are part of an investigation into "thousands of apps" that had access to Facebook data. The social media major said a thorough investigation into whether they did misuse any data is pending.
summary: फेसबुक ने डेटा के दुरुपयोग की जांच में 200 ऐप्स को निलंबित कर दिया

text: The driver of a Tesla Model S which crashed into a firetruck at a red light in Utah, US, has confirmed that the vehicle was operating on "Autopilot" mode. The 28-year-old driver also admitted that she was looking at her phone prior to the collision. Further, the car was moving at a speed of 100 kmph, according to the police.
summary: ऑटोपायलट उस समय था जब कार 100 किमी प्रति घंटे की रफ्तार से दुर्घटनाग्रस्त हुई: टेस्ला ड्राइवर

text: The Delhi Police used psychological analysis of at least five friends and family members to prove Congress MP Shashi Tharoor and his wife Sunanda Pushkar had a "strained relationship", reports quoting officials said. After an investigation of four years, the police have filed a 3,000-page chargesheet accusing Tharoor of abetment to suicide and subjecting Pushkar to cruelty.
summary: थरूर के खिलाफ मामला बनाने के लिए पुलिस ने मनोवैज्ञानिक परीक्षण किया

text: The central government has issued instructions to retiring employees to not use selfies as photographs while filling their pension forms. Further, the government has directed them against using photographs with coloured and dark glasses or with long hair covering their eyes. There are over 48 lakh employees working in the central government and 61 lakh pensioners.
summary: पेंशन फॉर्म में सेल्फी का उपयोग न करें: सरकार कर्मचारियों को बताती है

text: A 65-year-old had passed away after he was assaulted by Punjab Cabinet Minister Navjot Singh Sidhu in 1988 over his objections to Sidhu's car blocking his way. While a sessions court acquitted Sidhu over lack of medical evidence, the Punjab and Haryana High Court convicted him in 2006. The Supreme Court stayed the conviction and will pronounce its verdict today.
summary: क्या है 1988 का रोड रेज मामला नवजोत सिद्धू के खिलाफ?

text: After Madhya Pradesh Board announced the Class 10 and 12 results, as many as six students committed suicide while three survived the attempts. Two Class 10 students of the same school attempted suicide and are said to be in a critical condition. Last year, 12 students had committed suicide with three students making attempts after the results were declared.
summary: 6 छात्र आत्म हत्या करते हैं, 3 एमपी बोर्ड के परिणाम के बाद प्रयास करते हैं

text: Meghan Markle's father Thomas Markle has refused to attend his daughter's wedding to UK Prince Harry, according to reports. The 73-year-old reportedly took the decision amid allegations that he cooperated with a photo agency to stage pictures of himself preparing for the wedding day. "This is a deeply personal moment for Ms Markle," a royal spokesperson said.
summary: मेघन मार्कल के पिता शाही शादी में शामिल नहीं हुए: रिपोर्ट

text: Bangladesh Police has arrested 1,700 suspected drug traffickers in a nationwide drive aimed at curbing the surge in trade of methamphetamine along the country's borders. Police urged drug dealers to surrender their stock, saying it would be good for them. Calling drug trafficking a menace, police officials said, "We hope we'll overcome it together."
summary: बांग्लादेश राष्ट्रव्यापी नशा विरोधी अभियान में 1,700 को गिरफ्तार करता है

text: China aims to deliver its domestically developed AG600, the world's largest amphibious aircraft, by 2022, state media reported. The AG600, which can carry 50 people during maritime search-and-rescue missions, has been developed as part of a drive to modernise China's military in a bid to handle territorial disputes in places like the South China Sea.
summary: चीन 2022 तक दुनिया का सबसे बड़ा उभयचर विमान देने के लिए

text: The RBI has asked state-owned Allahabad Bank to reduce its exposure to unrated and high-risk advances in view of deteriorating financial health. The central bank also restricted the lender's access to raise high-cost deposits and creation of non-banking assets. Notably, the bank reported a loss of Ã¢ÂÂ¹3,509 crore for the March quarter amid worsening asset quality.
summary: RBI ने जमा की जगह, इलाहाबाद बैंक पर उधार प्रतिबंध

text: Speaking about being offered the role of Hrithik Roshan's mother in 'Agneepath', Richa Chadha said, "That was a...stupid idea of the person who offered me that role." "I think he was smoking something wrong," she jokingly added. Richa, who portrayed Nawazuddin Siddiqui's mother in 'Gangs of Wasseypur', further said, "That was a huge risk...I took at that point in time."
summary: मुझे अग्निपथ: ऋचा में ऋतिक की माँ की भूमिका की पेशकश करना बेवकूफी थी

text: Actor Ryan Reynolds, who portrays the superhero 'Deadpool', went on a South Korean singing show 'King of Masked Singer' disguised as a unicorn and sang 'Tomorrow' from 'Annie'. The show's format involves contestants adopting masked personas while they sing and Reynolds followed this while wearing a unicorn mask and rainbow-edged cape. Ryan was in South Korea for promoting 'Deadpool 2'.
summary: डेडपूल अभिनेता दक्षिण कोरियाई शो में गेंडा के रूप में प्रच्छन्न है

text: Ranbir Kapoor and Ajay Devgn will be starring in an upcoming film by Luv Ranjan, who directed 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama'. "Ajay and Ranbir's spontaneity and versatility is electrifying and I'm elated to be working with not one, but two powerhouse performers in my next film," said Luv. The shooting of the romantic comedy film is scheduled to start next year.
summary: Ar प्यार का पंचनामा ’बनाने वाले की फिल्म में रणबीर, अजय के साथ

text: RJD chief Lalu Prasad Yadav on Monday returned to Ranchi's Birsa Munda jail after the completion of the five-day parole granted to him to attend his son Tej Pratap's wedding. Tej Pratap married Aishwarya Rai, the daughter of RJD legislator Chandrika Rai, on Saturday. Lalu Yadav has been serving prison sentences after being convicted in four fodder scam cases.
summary: बेटे की शादी के लिए 5 दिन की पैरोल के बाद लालू जेल गए

text: After BJP appointed former Congress minister Kanna Lakshminarayana as the party's Andhra Pradesh chief and MLA Somu Veerraju as state convenor of the election management committee, two local BJP local leaders resigned from their positions. Several other BJP leaders threatened to resign if Veerraju was not appointed as the party chief. Kanna had served Congress for over 30 years.
summary: भाजपा नेताओं ने पूर्व-कांग्रेसी मंत्री के आंध्र प्रदेश प्रमुख चुने जाने के बाद इस्तीफा दे दिया

text: Around 12 people were killed during various incidents of violence that took place during West Bengal panchayat elections on Monday, police said. The Union Home Ministry has sought a report from the state government on the violence. "Trinamool's victory was always assured because of sheer numbers...But Banerjee wants to demolish the Opposition completely," Congress leader Adhir Chowdhury said.
summary: पश्चिम बंगाल पंचायत चुनाव में हिंसा में 12 लोगों की मौत

text: After her eldest son Tej Pratap Yadav married RJD MLA Chandrika Rai's daughter Aishwarya Rai, former Bihar CM Rabri Devi said, "Hamari bahu Lakshminiya hai (My daughter-in-law is highly auspicious)." "Her arrival has brought good omen and several pleasant developments in the family," she added. Rabri was elevated as the Opposition leader in the Bihar Legislative Council last week.
summary: Hamari bahu Lakshminiya hai: बेटे की शादी के बाद राबड़ी देवी

text: In a recent email to Tesla employees, CEO Elon Musk said, "To ensure that Tesla is well prepared for the future, we have been undertaking a thorough reorganisation of our company." As part of the reorganisation, Tesla is also "flattening the management structure", he added. This comes amid reports that Tesla was facing manufacturing problems, leading to delay in production.
summary: पूरी तरह से टेस्ला के पुनर्गठन का काम कर रहे हैं: मस्क

text: US-based researchers have studied the first known conjoined deer to be fully delivered, found in May 2016 in Minnesota. Lab tests confirmed that the deer were delivered stillborn and had a shared liver besides two hearts that shared a single pericardial sac. Only two cases of conjoined twins have been found in white-tailed deer, however, both were not delivered successfully.

text: In an apparent message to people wanting him dropped from the SRH playing XI over his batting form, Manish Pandey took to Instagram and updated his story, writing, "Every hater at the moment...IDGAF (I don't give a f**k)." summary: मैं एक च ** k नहीं देता: पांडे को चाहने वाले लोगों ने उसे गिरा दिया

text: CSK captain MS Dhoni has said he rates Ambati Rayudu highly and had planned to make him open even before the IPL 2018 started. "I had to make space for him. He can play pacers and spinners very well...he's somebody who doesn't look like a big hitter but clears the field every time he plays a big shot," Dhoni added.
summary: रेट रायडू को, उसे खोलने के लिए जगह बनानी थी: धोनी

text: Australian spin legend Shane Warne has said that it is "uncanny" the number of times Indian captain Virat Kohli has hit hundreds while chasing down opposition's score and even Sachin Tendulkar could not do it. "I am sure when he finishes in ten years or so he will be spoken about in the same breath as Sachin," Warne added.
summary: सचिन कोहली का पीछा करते हुए नहीं कर पाए: वार्न

text: Former Australia captain Ian Chappell has said that the BCCI's decision to not play a day-night Test in Australia is "extremely disappointing". Adding that Test cricket needs nurturing in an age where T20 leagues are flooding the market, Chappell said, "Nowhere can I find even a hint of (BCCI's decision) being in the best interests of the game."
summary: BCCI ने डी / एन टेस्ट निराशाजनक खेलने से इनकार किया: इयान चैपल

text: Pune-based supermarket chain Dorabjee's has posted the losses of e-commerce firms operating in India including Amazon and Flipkart on its website. The supermarket claims the numbers explain, "Why we have not started online shopping... YET!" Since its acquisition from the British in 1911,  the supermarket is still run by the same family.
summary: पुणे सुपरमार्केट अपनी वेबसाइट पर ई-कॉम फर्मों का नुकसान करता है

text: While SoftBank is considering selling its Flipkart stake, Walmart reportedly will not have any issue if the second-biggest shareholder SoftBank stays on as an investor. It won't make any "material difference" to Walmart even if the Japanese firm goes through with the sale, reports added. Currently, SoftBank holds 20-22% stake whereas Walmart has acquired 77% of the e-commerce firm.
summary: अगर Flipkart निवेशक के रूप में सॉफ्टबैंक रहता है, तो Walmart ठीक है: रिपोर्ट

text: An NIA court has convicted 18 people of organising a secret camp of the banned outfit Students' Islamic Movement of India (SIMI) in Kerala's Vagamon and acquitted 17 others. Many terror cases and the birth of the terror group Indian Mujahideen were traced to this camp, reports said. Founding member of the Indian Mujahideen, Abdul Qureshi, also attended the camp.
summary: केरल में प्रतिबंधित संगठन के शिविर के आयोजन के 18 दोषी

text: The Delhi Police has charged Congress leader Shashi Tharoor with abetment to suicide and cruelty over his wife Sunanda Pushkar's death in 2014. Pushkar had been found dead under mysterious circumstances in a luxury hotel room in Delhi. Earlier, the police had been investigating if Sunanda's death was suicide or murder.
summary: थरूर ने पत्नी सुनंदा की मौत में आत्महत्या करने का आरोप लगाया

text: The CBI on Monday filed a chargesheet against former Punjab National Bank Managing Director and CEO Usha Ananthasubramanian in relation to the Nirav Modi case. Ananthasubramanian, who is currently the CEO of Allahabad Bank, headed PNB between August 2015 and May 2017. Along with Nirav Modi, the chargesheet also named two PNB executive directors Brahmaji Rao and Sanjiv Sharan.
summary: Ex-PNB CEO ने नीरव मोदी मामले में पहली CBI चार्जशीट में नाम दिया

text: Former PM Manmohan Singh has written to President Ram Nath Kovind, asking him to caution PM Narendra Modi against using "threatening" and "intimidating" language against Congress leaders. Adding that the PM is not expected to use menacing language, Singh said, "This cannot be the language of the Prime Minister of a constitutionally governed democratic country of 1.3 billion people."
summary: पीएम मोदी को कांग्रेसी नेताओं को धमकी देने से रोकने के लिए कहें: मनमोहन टू प्रेज़

text: Rajasthan Royals captain Ajinkya Rahane was fined Ã¢ÂÂ¹12 lakh for maintaining slow over-rate in the match against Mumbai Indians on Sunday. "As it was his team's first offence of the season under the IPL's Code of Conduct relating to minimum over-rate offences, Mr Rahane was fined Ã¢ÂÂ¹12 lakh," an IPL press release said. RR won the match by seven wickets.
summary: आरआर के कप्तान अजिंक्य रहाणे ने धीमी ओवर गति के लिए ¢ for12 लाख का जुर्माना लगाया

text: Honouring US President Donald Trump, Israeli football club Beitar Jerusalem has added Trump to its name ahead of the inauguration of the US embassy in Jerusalem. "President Trump, in a courageous move, recognised Jerusalem as the eternal capital of Israel," the football club said. However, it is not clear if the name change is permanent.
summary: इजरायल फुटबॉल क्लब ने यूएस प्रेज ट्रम्प को सम्मानित करने के लिए नाम बदल दिया

text: Technology giant Microsoft tried to recruit Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg when he was in high school. At the time, Zuckerberg had co-developed a music app called Synapse Media Player that used artificial intelligence to learn users' music-listening habits. However, Zuckerberg and co-creator Adam D'Angelo got a patent for the technology and went to college instead.
summary: Microsoft ने हाई स्कूल में मार्क जुकरबर्ग को भर्ती करने की कोशिश की

text: Facebook Co-founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg created a family messaging system called ZuckNet when he was 12 years old. It was used by his father in his dental office, so that the receptionist could inform him of a patient without shouting. It was also used by the family to communicate within the house. Zuckerberg turned 34 on May 14.
summary: जकरबर्ग ने 12 साल की उम्र में एक फैमिली मैसेजिंग नेटवर्क बनाया

text: After a 19-day hiatus, state-run oil marketing companies have raised the prices of petrol and diesel by 17 paise and 21 paise per litre respectively in Delhi. Diesel prices on Monday reached Ã¢ÂÂ¹66.14 per litre in Delhi, a fresh record high. Petrol prices also rose to Ã¢ÂÂ¹74.80 per litre, the highest since September 14, 2013.
summary: 19 दिनों के बाद पेट्रोल, डीजल की कीमतों में बढ़ोतरी

text: Condemning a statement made by former Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif on 26/11 Mumbai attacks, Pakistan's National Security Committee (NSC) called it "completely false and misleading". The committee reportedly said that the delay in conclusion of Mumbai attacks case was caused by India. Sharif had said that militant organisations based in Pakistan were responsible for the Mumbai terror attacks.
summary: शरीफ की 26/11 की टिप्पणी 'पूरी तरह से गलत': पाक सुरक्षा निकाय

text: The Centre on Monday submitted a draft of the Cauvery scheme on water sharing between Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Kerala, and Puducherry before the Supreme Court. The court said it would consider and approve the scheme on May 16. Earlier, it had said the Centre was in "sheer contempt" of its February verdict directing the scheme be framed within six weeks.
summary: केंद्र ने सुप्रीम कोर्ट में कावेरी योजना का मसौदा तैयार किया

text: Former North Korean deputy ambassador to Britain Thae Yong Ho, who fled his post in 2016, has said the country will never fully give up nuclear weapons. The current negotiations will not end with "complete disarmament" but with "reduced North Korean nuclear threat", he added. North Korea said it will dismantle its nuclear test site between May 23 and 25.
summary: N कोरिया कभी भी पूरी तरह से परमाणु हथियार नहीं देगा: ख़राब

text: Sarah Mullally on Saturday became the first female Bishop of London at a service held at St Paul's Cathedral. The 56-year-old, who worked with the National Health Service (NHS) for over 35 years, now holds the third most senior position in the Church of England. Notably, legislation to allow women bishops was formally adopted by the Church in 2014.
summary: सारा मुल्ली लंदन की पहली महिला बिशप बनीं

text: A video shot by a tourist, showing nine lions crossing the road, in the Gir forest of Gujarat has gone viral on social media. The video showed six lionesses and three cubs walking across the road. Earlier, a video of a lioness and three cubs being chased by a truck driver in the same area had sparked outrage online.
summary: गुजरात के गिर में 9 शेरों का सड़क पार करने का वीडियो वायरल

text: India's inflation measured by the Wholesale Price Index (WPI) rose to a four-month high of 3.18% in April, government data showed on Monday. Fuel and Power inflation grew 7.85% during the month while inflation in fruits was at 19.47%. Notably, the wholesale inflation in March was at an eight-month low of 2.47%.
summary: थोक मुद्रास्फीति अप्रैल में 4 महीने के उच्च स्तर 3.18% पर पहुंच गई

text: The government is reportedly planning to introduce a mechanism to identify fake medicines wherein drugmakers will be required to print a unique 14-digit alphanumeric code on packages. Consumers will be able to text the code to a number to check whether the product is genuine. The government plans to initially build a data bank of 300 medicine brands, reports said.
summary: नकली दवाओं की पहचान करने के लिए सरकार ने अनोखे कोड की योजना बनाई

text: US printer and copier company Xerox has called off a $6.1-billion takeover by Japan's Fujifilm Holdings in a settlement with activist investors Carl Icahn and Darwin Deason. The two investors, who together own 15% of Xerox, had opposed the deal saying it undervalued the firm.nThe settlement will see CEO Jeff Jacobson, as well as five other directors, step down.
summary: ज़ेरॉक्स ने $ 6.1 बिलियन की बिक्री को फुजीफिल्म को बंद कर दिया

text: Customers who bought jewellery using cash from Nirav Modi's stores in the two financial years starting 2015-16 are under the Income Tax Department's scanner, according to reports. The investigation will be based on a list specified in a confidential document of about 90 pages prepared by the department. This data has now been circulated to relevant regional departments, reports added.
summary: I-T लेंस के तहत नीरव मोदी से आभूषण खरीदने वाले लोग

text: Denying the rumours of marrying Prabhudeva, actress Nikesha Patel tweeted, "I think it is time to clarify...I am not marrying anyone...he is purely just a friend...and a well wisher. I call him sir only." During a media interaction earlier, she had reportedly said, "You are asking about doing a movie with Prabhudeva but I want to marry Prabhudeva."
summary: मैं उन्हें सर कहता हूं: अभिनेत्री ने प्रभुदेवा से शादी करने की अफवाह का खंडन किया

text: Kareena Kapoor Khan said that there is a direct link between a girl being educated and empowered. "There's an important need to stress on education of the girl child. Pregnancy during adolescence puts both the mother and child in danger and proper education will help put a check on it," she added. She said this at a UNICEF India event.
summary: बालिकाओं की शिक्षा सीधे सशक्तिकरण से जुड़ी: करीना

text: MI's Hardik Pandya dropped his bat while backing up to non-striker's end in the middle of a run, and made a football-like sliding tackle before a throw hit his stumps on Sunday. The throw from RR skipper Ajinkya Rahane knocked the bails, but Pandya was already inside the crease without the bat, and he ran a double on the deflection.
summary: हार्दिक फुटबॉल की तरह फिसलने वाले टैकल से बचते हैं

text: Reacting to MI captain Rohit Sharma getting out for a golden duck against RR on Sunday, a user tweeted, "Rohit has enough ducks to start a poultry farm." Other tweets read, "Whenever people start doubting the talent of Rohit Sharma, he strikes back with a scintillating & quickfire 0," and "Hardik's economy rate is greater than Rohit's average this year."
summary: रोहित के पास एक पोल्ट्री फार्म, ट्वीट उपयोगकर्ता शुरू करने के लिए पर्याप्त बतख हैं

text: A Sichuan Airlines flight made an emergency landing in the Chinese city of Chengdu on Monday after a windshield on right side of the jet's cockpit broke, China's aviation authority said. While a cabin crew member and a pilot were injured, all passengers landed safely. The passengers were later shifted to another aircraft to continue their journey to Lhasa.
summary: प्लेन विंडशील्ड के टूटने पर प्लेन इमरजेंसी लैंडिंग करता है

text: Sidelined BJP leader Shatrughan Sinha has said he will contest the 2019 General Elections from Bihar's Patna Sahib constituency "even if the situation is otherwise". Sinha has been elected as an MP from the constituency for two consecutive terms. Earlier, Sinha had urged PM Narendra Modi to maintain the "Maryada and Garima of honourable PM" during the Karnataka elections.
summary: किसी भी स्थिति में 2019 का चुनाव लड़ेंगे: शत्रुघ्न

text: A TDP worker in Andhra Pradesh's Dachepalli was arrested on Sunday for allegedly raping a 14-year-old repeatedly for four months and impregnating her. The incident came to light after the victim fell unconscious and was rushed to a hospital, where doctors found her three months pregnant. The accused had also reportedly threatened the girl against speaking about the incident.
summary: 14 साल की बच्ची को अगवा कर रेप करने के आरोप में टीडीपी कार्यकर्ता

text: Three of the accused in the Kathua rape and murder case have moved the Supreme Court alleging custodial torture by the police. The three have also demanded that their interrogation be video-recorded. Earlier, the court had ordered that the trial be shifted to Punjab's Pathankot from Jammu after the victim's father filed a plea.
summary: कठुआ बलात्कार के तीन आरोपियों ने SC पर कस्टोडियल टॉर्चर का आरोप लगाया

text: Taking a jibe at Congress, Oil Minister Dharmendra Pradhan has said that as opposed to previous regimes, the present government worked hard to earn 10% stake in a UAE oilfield. "There was an oil minister earlier too. But, our team has done such a good work," Pradhan added. An ONGC-led consortium had agreed to pay $600 million for the stake.
summary: UAE के तेल क्षेत्र में 10% हिस्सेदारी अर्जित करने के लिए कड़ी मेहनत: तेल मंत्री

text: A Tesla Model S car crashed into the back of a fire truck at a red light in Utah, United States. According to the police, the car was moving at a speed of 100 kmph and the witnesses claimed the car did not brake before impact. However, it is not known whether the Autopilot was on before the crash.
summary: टेस्ला कार अमेरिका में लाल बत्ती पर आग ट्रक में दुर्घटनाग्रस्त

text: Lina Medina is the youngest person on record to give birth after she delivered a baby on May 14, 1939, aged five. Doctors thought that Medina, who is believed to have been suffering from 'precocious puberty', had a tumour when her abdomen started growing. However, tests revealed she was seven months pregnant and she later gave birth through Caesarean section.
summary: जन्म देने वाले सबसे कम उम्र का व्यक्ति केवल 5 साल का था

text: Over 53 people died and 65 were injured due to thunderstorms across the country on Sunday, the Home Affairs Ministry has said. While Uttar Pradesh witnessed 39 deaths, nine occurred in Andhra Pradesh, four in West Bengal, and one in Delhi. The India Meteorological Department has predicted thunderstorms in parts of north and east India on Monday.
summary: रविवार को पूरे भारत में आंधी-तूफान में 53 लोग मारे गए

text: An iPhone exploded and caught fire at a repair shop this week in Las Vegas, United States, according to reports. The surveillance video shows a worker sitting at a desk when, suddenly, an object on his desk explodes and catches fire. The model was reported to be an iPhone 6s which was in the store for screen replacement.
summary: iPhone फट गया, अमेरिका में मरम्मत की दुकान में लगी आग: रिपोर्ट

text: Mark Zuckerberg once had a business card which read, "I'm CEO, B*tch." during the early years of Facebook. According to the card's designer Bryan Veloso, the idea came from the fact that Zuckerberg actually used to utter the phrase at the time by emulating the style of Steve Jobs. Born on May 14, 1984, Zuckerberg turned 34 today.
summary: जुकरबर्ग के पास एक बिजनेस कार्ड था जिसमें लिखा था, 'मैं सीईओ हूं, बी * टीच।'

text: A CPM candidate and his wife were allegedly set on fire on Sunday, a day before the panchayat polls in West Bengal. Further, 20 people were injured after clashes broke out between two groups on Monday in Cooch Behar. The clashes were triggered after TMC Minister Rabindra Nath Ghosh allegedly slapped an Opposition candidate inside a polling booth.
summary: WB पोल हिंसा के बीच सीपीएम उम्मीदवार ने आग लगाई, 20 घायल

text: Japan's conglomerate SoftBank has held talks to invest as much as $3 billion in Paytm Mall, according to reports. However, in lines with the recent Walmart-Flipkart deal agreement, SoftBank can go ahead only when it exits from Flipkart. A clause in the Flipkart agreement restricts SoftBank from investing more than $500 million in Paytm Mall until 2020, reports claimed.
summary: सॉफ्टबैंक ने पेटीएम मॉल में $ 3 बिलियन का निवेश करने के लिए बातचीत की: रिपोर्ट

text: India witnessed 82 Internet shutdowns between May 2017 and April 2018, the highest in South Asia, according to a UNESCO report. Kashmir Valley experienced nearly half of the cases of Internet shutdowns in the country. Pakistan witnessed 12 instances of Internet shutdowns, while Bangladesh, Afghanistan, and Sri Lanka reported one such case each, the report further said.
summary: भारत ने दक्षिण एशिया में सबसे अधिक इंटरनेट बंद देखा: यूनेस्को

text: After Nawaz Sharif said that militant organisations based in Pakistan were responsible for the 26/11 Mumbai terror attacks, his political party PML-N stated that the former Prime Minister's statement had been "grossly misinterpreted". It further said that Sharif needs no certificate from anybody on his commitment and capacity to preserve, protect and promote Pakistan's national security.
summary: शरीफ का 26/11 का बयान 'बेहद गलत व्याख्या': पार्टी

text: Al-Qaeda chief Ayman al-Zawahiri has called on Muslims to carry out jihad against the US over its decision to shift its Israeli embassy to Jerusalem. Adding that the US move was evidence that negotiations and "appeasement" have failed Palestinians, al-Zawahiri said his predecessor Osama bin Laden had declared the US "the first enemy of the Muslims".
summary: अल-कायदा प्रमुख अल-जवाहिरी अमेरिका के खिलाफ जिहाद का आह्वान करता है

text: Condemning the Islamic State attack in Paris that killed one person, US President Donald Trump said countries will have to "open their eyes" and "change their thought process" on terror. "This kind of sickness is not compatible with a peaceful and successful country," he added. The attack was carried out by a knife-wielding man identified as French national Khamzat Azimov.
summary: आतंक पर आंखें खोलने की जरूरत है देश: पेरिस हमले पर ट्रंप

text: US State Secretary Mike Pompeo has said the country will have to assure Kim Jong-un that his ouster is not part of the agenda for the summit between the North Korean leader and President Donald Trump. "This has been a trade-off that has been pending for 25 years," Pompeo added, referring to failed negotiations with North Korea over the years.
summary: अमेरिका को N कोरिया में कोई शासन परिवर्तन का आश्वासन नहीं देना होगा: पोम्पेओ

text: A family of six, including four children, was behind the suicide attacks on three Indonesian churches that killed at least 13 people. Police officials said that the children were aged between nine and 18, adding they suspected the family had recently returned to Indonesia from Syria. President Joko Widodo condemned the attacks calling them "barbaric".
summary: इंडोनेशिया के हमलों के पीछे 4 बच्चों सहित 6 का परिवार

text: Security cameras caught a burglar doing a victory dance after he successfully entered an office building in California, US. The 43-year-old then stole a laptop and cash from the building. However, he was later arrested and charged with felony burglary, possession of stolen property and providing a false identity to an officer.
summary: ब्रेक-इन के बाद विजयी नृत्य करते हुए बर्गलर

text: A 24-year-old Chinese woman woke up from coma after hearing pop songs by Taiwanese singer Jay Chou, a Chinese newspaper reported. She had reportedly been in coma since November 2017 after suffering a brain dysfunction due to lack of oxygen. The nurse who played the songs said, "I listened to Chou's songs growing up, so...thought maybe she'd also like them."
summary: पॉप गाने सुनकर महिलाएं कोमा से उठती हैं

text: A Florida man has been fined $120 million by the Federal Communications Commission for scamming people with 96.8 million automated telemarketing calls during a three-month period. The calls offered travel deals from major travel companies but attempted to sell packages unrelated to those companies. The man used fraudulent caller ID information to falsely present calls as coming from local numbers.
summary: 96 मिलियन डॉलर के घोटाले के पीछे आदमी ने 120 मिलियन डॉलर का जुर्माना लगाया

text: A Tibetan Mastiff puppy bought by a Chinese woman during a vacation has turned out to be an endangered Asiatic Black Bear. The woman had been raising the animal for two years. She said the bear has been sent to a wildlife rescue centre as keeping a protected wild animal at home without a license is illegal.
summary: चीनी महिला द्वारा उठाया गया पालतू कुत्ता एक भालू निकला

text: Airtel has denied Jio's accusations that it is providing eSIM service on Apple Watch in violation of licence conditions. "This is yet another frivolous complaint by a desperate operator, whose sole aim appears to have a monopoly over everything that they do," Airtel said. Jio alleged that Airtel violated licence norms by using nodes based abroad to offer eSIM services.
summary: Jio की शिकायत फालतू, यह एक हताश ऑपरेटर है: Airtel

text: India-born Hinduja brothers, Srichand and Gopichand, have been displaced to the second position in the UK rich list by chemicals billionaire Jim Ratcliffe. The Sunday Times Rich List said Hinduja brothers were worth ÃÂ£20.64 billion, while Ratcliffe was worth ÃÂ£21.05 billion. At ÃÂ£14.66 billion, steel tycoon Lakshmi Mittal moved down from fourth to the fifth place.

text: Delhi Daredevils' 20-year-old batsman Rishabh Pant has broken Gautam Gambhir's 10-year-old record of scoring the most runs for the team in a single IPL season. Pant has scored 582 runs in 12 matches so far, while Gambhir hit 534 runs for DD in the first IPL. Pant, who was retained for Ã¢ÂÂ¹15 crore, is playing his third season with DD.
summary: 20 साल के पंत ने गंभीर के 10 साल पुराने आईपीएल रिकॉर्ड को तोड़ा

text: Mercedes' British driver Lewis Hamilton won the Spanish Grand Prix on Sunday to register a record 41st victory when starting from pole. The 33-year-old four-time world champion overtook seven-time world champion Michael Schumacher, who had won 40 races from pole. Further, Valtteri Bottas finished second to help Mercedes secure their first one-two finish in a same race this season.
summary: हैमिल्टन ने स्पैनिश जीपी की जीत में माइकल शूमाकर के रिकॉर्ड को तोड़ा

text: Liverpool winger Mohamed Salah set the record for most goals in a 38-match Premier League season after scoring his 32nd during his team's 4-0 thrashing of Brighton on the 2017/18 season's last day on Sunday. Salah overtook the previous 31-goal record held jointly by Cristiano Ronaldo (Manchester United, 2007/08), Luis SuÃÂ¡rez (Liverpool, 2013/14) and Alan Shearer (Blackburn Rovers, 1995/1996).
summary: सलाहा ने 32 वें गोल के साथ रोनाल्डो के पीएल रिकॉर्ड को तोड़ा

text: Britain regulators have suggested buying 'porn passes' available at the local newsstands to verify user age on porn websites under the new digital economy law. Priced at $13, the 16-digit code aims at protecting privacy without entering personal information into an online database. Those who don't comply risk being blocked by internet services, and face fines of up to $350,000.
summary: ब्रिटेन ऑनलाइन आयु सत्यापित करने के लिए न्यूज़स्टैंड में 'पोर्न पास' बेचने के लिए

text: Paytm has introduced a 'My Payments' feature which allows users to make recurring, high-value payments on its app. The company's Senior Vice President Deepak Abbot said the feature is useful for monthly payments such as house rent, driver's salary, milk or newspaper vendor payments. He also said there was no limit to the number of payments made through this feature.
summary: पेटीएम ऐप में स्वचालित आवर्ती भुगतान के लिए सुविधा मिलती है

text: An IndiGo Airlines employee has been arrested for making a hoax call to Delhi's Airport, falsely claiming there was a bomb in a Mumbai-bound flight, earlier this month. The police revealed that the employee had called because he was "depressed" and "frustrated" with the airlines and wanted to take revenge as he was issued a warning to improve his performance.
summary: इंडिगो के आदमी ने दिल्ली एयरपोर्ट पर होक्स बम की धमकी के लिए फोन किया

text: The daughter of noted Pakistani poet Faiz Ahmed Faiz has alleged that she was denied entry to the 15th Asia Media Summit in New Delhi, where she was invited as a speaker. Moneeza Hashmi, a Pakistani television and media personality, said she was told she was not registered upon her arrival. However, the event's organisers have denied the charges.
summary: दिल्ली शिखर सम्मेलन में प्रवेश से वंचित: फ़ैज़ अहमद फ़ैज़ की बेटी

text: Amid the controversy over a picture of Pakistan founder Muhammad Ali Jinnah inside AMU, Haryana Finance Minister Captain Abhimanyu said the university should be renamed after Jat King Raja Mahendra Pratap Singh. The minister claimed Singh had donated land for the university without any hesitation and with an objective of education to all, irrespective of religion.
summary: जाट राजा राजा महेंद्र के बाद एएमयू का नाम बदला: हरियाणा वित्त मंत्री

text: The Maharashtra Anti-Terrorism Squad (ATS) has arrested a 32-year-old man for allegedly planning a terror attack on essential services in Maharashtra and other parts of the country. The accused had gone to Pakistan to be trained at a camp operated by a terror outfit after being called there by a man wanted for terror activities in Mumbai, ATS officials said.
summary: महा एटीएस पूरे भारत में आतंकी हमलों की योजना बनाने वाले व्यक्ति को गिरफ्तार करती है

text: With a legacy of 67 years, Sanyo brings to India its range of 4K Ultra HD, Smart, Full HD and HD ready LED TVs. The Japanese TV giant is offering a minimum of 30% off on its range of LED TVs. ICICI cardholders can avail extra 10% discount. The sale on Amazon.in ends on May 16. T&C apply.
summary: अमेज़ॅन पर Sanyo एलईडी टीवी पर 30% की छूट

text: At least 18 people were killed after being struck by lightning in Andhra Pradesh, West Bengal, and Telangana on Sunday, officials said. The victims include three farmers who were killed after they visited their fields in Telangana's Arepalli to check on their crop. Four children were killed by lightning when they went to collect mangoes in West Bengal's Howrah.
summary: आंध्र, तेलंगाना, पश्चिम बंगाल में बिजली 18 को मार देती है

text: Slamming Swedish YouTuber PewDiePie, who has the most subscribers on YouTube, Ekta Kapoor tweeted, "Bhai tu kaun hai!" She slammed him when he mocked the quality of Ekta Kapoor's serial Kasamh Se's title track. The description of the video on YouTube said, "Kasamh Se original title track (good quality)". PewDiePie had shared the video and jokingly captioned it, "good quality".
summary: भाई तू कौन है: एकता टू यूटर जो सबसे ज्यादा सब्सक्राइबर है

text: Karnataka Chief Minister and Congress CM candidate Siddaramaiah on Sunday said, "This is my last election". The 69-year-old leader, who had earlier claimed that the 2013 Assembly elections were his "last elections", said Congress high command had directed him to contest elections in 2018 due to his position as the CM. He is contesting from two constituencies this year.
summary: यह मेरा आखिरी चुनाव है: कर्नाटक के सीएम सिद्धारमैया

text: Karnataka Chief Electoral Officer Sanjiv Kumar announced that Karnataka witnessed 72.13% voter turnout on Saturday, making it the highest-ever turnout recorded by the state in Assembly elections. While a voter turnout of 71.45% was recorded in 2013, the previous record of 71.9% turnout was established in 1978. People cast votes in 58,000 polling booths in 222 constituencies on Saturday.
summary: कर्नाटक में सबसे ज्यादा 72% मतदान हुआ

text: RR wicketkeeper-batsman Jos Buttler slammed his fifth straight fifty in IPL 2018 on Sunday to equal former Indian cricketer Virender Sehwag's record of most straight 50+ scores in the IPL. Sehwag had achieved the feat while representing DD in the IPL 2012. Buttler is also only the second batsman after Shane Watson to hit two successive 90+ scores in IPL.
summary: बटलर ने सहवाग के आईपीएल में सर्वाधिक सीधे 50 के रिकॉर्ड की बराबरी की

text: CPI(M) General Secretary Sitaram Yechury has said true believers of Marxism adapt to changing conditions as the philosophy is based on "concrete analysis of concrete conditions". Speaking about the rape and murder of an eight-year-old girl in Jammu and Kashmir, he compared the "private armies" which attack Dalits in India to "Blackshirts and Brownshirts of Hitler and Mussolini".
summary: सच्चे मार्क्सवादी बदलती परिस्थितियों के अनुकूल हैं: सीपीआई (एम) प्रमुख

text: Former Pakistani Interior Minister Chaudhry Nisar Ali Khan on Sunday blamed India's "stubbornness" and "uncooperative attitude" for delays in concluding the country's trial into the 26/11 Mumbai attacks. He also claimed that the only 26/11 attacker captured, Ajmal Kasab, was hanged so that the attacks could be used as "a tool for Pakistan bashing across the world on political basis".
summary: भारत की जिद ने 26/11 के मुकदमे में देरी की: पूर्व पाक मंत्री

text: Director Vikramaditya Motwane revealed that he had approached Sidharth Malhotra and Imran Khan before finalising Harshvardhan Kapoor for 'Bhavesh Joshi Superhero'. "With Imran it was like, his career wasn't going well and we couldn't raise the money," he said. Talking about considering Shahid Kapoor also for the film, he added, "It was just a conversation, it was never formulated." n
summary: सिद्धार्थ, भावेश जोशी सुपरहीरो के लिए इमरान: निर्माता

text: Sonakshi Sinha, who has worked in Tamil film 'Lingaa' with Rajinikanth, said, "Their (regional cinema's) style of work is slightly better than how we work over here (in Bollywood)." She added, "In terms of timings, vision, originality and the concepts that they come up with... like the stuff they make over there, we could not even imagine making over here."
summary: क्षेत्रीय सिनेमा में कार्य शैली B'wood से बेहतर है: सोनाक्षी

text: Hollywood actor Benedict Cumberbatch said he will only agree to roles if female actors are paid as much as male actors. He added that equal pay and a place at the table are the central tenets of feminism. He further joked that he will be open to taking up a role in a women-centric film where men are objectified.
summary: यदि महिला सह-कलाकार को समान भुगतान नहीं किया जाता है तो वह भूमिका से इंकार कर देगी: बेनेडिक्ट

text: Sharing an old poem on Twitter which Sushant Singh Rajput had written for his late mother, he wrote, "Happy Mother's Day everyone." Sushant had earlier revealed the poem was his first ever attempt at "creative writing". In another tweet, Sushant wrote, "I wish with all my wins, money, successes...I could just be able to have one more minute with you."
summary: सुशांत ने अपनी दिवंगत मां के लिए लिखी गई पुरानी कविता साझा की

text: Pakistani actress Mahira Khan, who will make her red carpet debut at Cannes Film Festival 2018, said she hopes she doesn't trip and fall on the red carpet. "The only thing I'm worried about is that the Cannes red carpet is one of the longest red carpets in the world," added Mahira. She further said she is excited but nervous.
summary: मुझे आशा है कि मैं कान्स में रेड कार्पेट पर नहीं जाऊंगा और गिरूंगा: माहिरा

text: Wicketkeeper-batsman Jos Buttler slammed 94*(53) after scoring 95*(60) in the previous match as his team Rajasthan Royals defeated Mumbai Indians to register their third consecutive victory in the IPL 2018 on Sunday. Rajasthan Royals are now fifth on the IPL 2018 points table with 12 points from 12 matches while Mumbai Indians are sixth with 10 points from 12 matches.
summary: बटलर अपने 95 * को 94 * के साथ आरआर पोस्ट 3 डी सीधे जीत के रूप में मानते हैं

text: RR's Sanju Samson pulled off a diving catch to dismiss MI's Hardik Pandya in the IPL 2018 on Sunday. Pandya had whipped a Ben Stokes delivery towards the deep midwicket, where Samson put in a full length dive after covering a considerable distance to pluck the catch. Samson tumbled to the ground but managed to hold on to the ball.
summary: संजू सैमसन ने डाइविंग कैच को खींचने के अपने अधिकार को जगाया

text: Delhi Daredevils' wicketkeeper-batsman Rishabh Pant took to Twitter to clarify after a parody news account shared a statement attributed to him, which claimed he was "angry" with the selectors for not picking him in the senior Indian team. Pant said that he had "never said anything like that" and urged people to not spread rumours.
summary: फर्जी बयान वायरल होने के बाद ऋषभ पंत ने स्पष्ट किया

text: Arsenal fans on Sunday used a plane to display a 'One Arsene Wenger...Arsenal Legend' banner as a tribute to mark manager Arsene Wenger's last match in charge of the London club against Huddersfield. Interestingly, the same plane was used by the fans to display 'Wenger Out Means Out' banner last year after a series of poor performances by Arsenal.
summary: प्लेन ने वेंगर को धन्यवाद देने के लिए पिछले साल 'वेन्जर आउट' प्रदर्शित किया

text: Barcelona, playing without Lionel Messi, suffered their first defeat in La Liga after record 43 matches by losing 4-5 to 15th-placed Levante on Sunday. Levante were leading 5-1 at one stage before Barcelona netted thrice in a match featuring two hat-tricks, 30 fouls, and 13 yellow cards. Barcelona had last lost a league match on April 8, 2017, against Malaga.
summary: बारासो मेस्सी बाकी, 43- नाबाद स्ट्रीक समाप्त होते ही 4-5 से हार गए

text: A five-foot-long snake slithered its way into the outfield grass during a Minor League Baseball match between San Antonio Missions and Frisco RoughRiders, bringing the match to a brief halt on Friday. As many as six groundsmen managed to trap it in a bucket and get it off the field after several minutes before the play continued.
summary: 5 फुट लंबे सांप ने खेत पर हमला किया, ग्राउंडमैन ने उसे बाल्टी में फंसा लिया

text: World number 10 Petra Kvitova has become the first female tennis player to win the Madrid Open thrice after defeating world number 20 Kiki Bertens on Saturday. Kvitova was forced out of action for over five months after being stabbed by a burglar at her home in December 2016. The 28-year-old has now won four titles this year.
summary: बर्गलर द्वारा मारा गया खिलाड़ी 3rd मैड्रिड ओपन खिताब जीतता है

text: CSK on Sunday registered an eight-wicket victory in the top-of-the-table clash to end SRH's six-match winning streak in the IPL 2018. CSK were helped by Ambati Rayudu who slammed an unbeaten 100*(62) in the match to become the 14th Indian to hit a century in the IPL. CSK are second on the IPL 2018 table while SRH are first.
summary: CSK ने SRH के 6-गेम जीतने वाली लकीर को समाप्त कर दिया, क्योंकि रायुडु ने 1 टन का स्कोर किया

text: Manchester City on Sunday became the first-ever club in Premier League history to earn 100 points in a single season. Gabriel Jesus scored in the 94th minute (injury time) to help the champions achieve the feat in their last match of the 2017/18 season against Southampton. Further, City's 106 goalsÃÂ are the most by a team in a PL season.
summary: मैन सिटी 1 कभी पीएल सीज़न में 100 अंक अर्जित करने वाला क्लब

text: Congress leader P Chidambaram on Sunday mockingly tweeted, "The buzz in Delhi is that Ms Nirmala Sitharaman will be removed as Defence Minister and appointed as lawyer of the Income-tax department." This comes after Sitharaman said the Income Tax Department's chargesheet against Chidambaram and his family for allegedly not disclosing their foreign assets was a "Nawaz Sharif moment" for Congress.
summary: सीतारमण नई आई-टी विभाग की वकील बनने जा रही हैं: चिदंबरम

text: The police on Sunday arrested a 65-year-old labourer for raping a five-year-old and a seven-year-old after using toffees to lure them inside a panchayat building in Andhra Pradesh's Chittoor district. A rape case has been filed against the accused under the POCSO Act. The incident comes after another man allegedly raped and impregnated a 14-year-old in Guntur.
summary: 65 वर्षीय आंध्र के व्यक्ति ने पंचायत भवन में 2 नाबालिगों से बलात्कार किया

text: In a video message played at Goa BJP workers' meeting on Sunday, CM Manohar Parrikar said he will return from the US after receiving treatment for a pancreatic ailment in the "next few weeks". This comes after Congress asked BJP President Amit Shah to give a Chief Minister to Goa, alleging that the state had been "headless" in Parrikar's absence.
summary: कुछ हफ्तों में इलाज के बाद लौटेंगे: गोवा के सीएम पर्रिकर

text: After the US withdrew from the 2015 Iran nuclear deal, US National Security Advisor John Bolton has said that the country could impose sanctions on European companies that continue trade with Iran. "It depends on the conduct of other governments," he added. International sanctions against Iran were lifted in 2015 after it agreed to restrictions on its nuclear programme.
summary: अमेरिका यूरोपीय संघ की कंपनियों को मंजूरी दे सकता है जो ईरान के साथ व्यापार करते हैं

text: Commerce Minister Suresh Prabhu has said it is necessary to have a banking system that understands the jewellery sector and supports its growth. "We would like banks to fund everything which is genuine, bankable and has the capability to scale up," he said. He urged banks to adopt proper risk-mitigation mechanisms to avoid any potential frauds.
summary: आभूषण क्षेत्र को समझने के लिए बैंकों की जरूरत: वाणिज्य मंत्री

text: All flight operations were suspended at Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport on Sunday due to a major thunderstorm. Several flights were diverted to other airports near Delhi to avoid the storm which hit the national capital region. Metro services were resumed after being suspended for over 30 minutes due to the dust storm accompanied by heavy winds and rain.
summary: तेज आंधी के कारण दिल्ली एयरपोर्ट पर उड़ानें ठप हो गईं

text: Defence Minister Nirmala Sitharaman has refuted the possibility of a unilateral ceasefire between security forces and militants in Jammu and Kashmir. "Terrorism has to be eliminated by the Indian Army for which firm action is required," she said. Earlier, J&K parties had called for a ceasefire beginning from the month of Ramzan till the conclusion of Amarnath Yatra.
summary: रमज़ान के दौरान जम्मू-कश्मीर में कोई संघर्षविराम नहीं, अमरनाथ यात्रा: सरकार

text: A Chinese woman refused a 2 million yuan (over Ã¢ÂÂ¹2 crore) "breakup fee" from her ex-boyfriend, saying that the amount was not enough. She left a suitcase filled with the cash in a bar after arguing that the compensation to end the relationship should be over Ã¢ÂÂ¹10 crore. Bar workers discovered the suitcase while closing for the night.
summary: महिला का कहना है कि break says2cr 'गोलमाल शुल्क' पर्याप्त नहीं है, इसे बार पर छोड़ देता है

text: 'Manto' director Nandita Das joined Salma Hayek in the women's protest march against lack of female representation at the 71st Cannes Film Festival. Cannes jury head Cate Blanchett led the demonstration alongside 81 women, including 'Wonder Woman' director Patty Jenkins and 'Manto' actress Rasika Duggal. It preceded premiere of the only female-directed film 'Girls of the Sun' competing this year.
summary: नंदिता दास कान महिलाओं के विरोध मार्च में सलमा हायेक के साथ शामिल हुईं

text: The BJP and Congress have ruled out the possibility of a post-poll alliance with JD(S) in the Karnataka Assembly elections, ahead of the vote counting scheduled on Tuesday. Most exit polls conducted on Saturday predicted a Hung Assembly in the 224-constituency state, suggesting that the JD(S) will be the 'kingmaker'. JD(S) said it expects to form the government.
summary: बीजेपी, कांग्रेस जद (एस) गठबंधन को खारिज कर देती है क्योंकि किसी भी बहुमत की भविष्यवाणी नहीं की गई है

text: Chennai Super Kings opener Ambati Rayudu recorded his maiden Indian Premier League century in his 126th match by reaching the three-figure mark in 62 balls against SunRisers Hyderabad on Sunday. The ton was the second by an Indian in IPL 2018, after Delhi Daredevils' Rishabh Pant's 128*(63) against SRH on Thursday. Rayudu's previous highest score in the IPL was 82(53).
summary: CSK के अंबाती रायडू ने 126 वें मैच में अपने पहले आईपीएल टन को पटक दिया

text: Congress' Karnataka CM candidate Siddaramaiah has said he is ready to "sacrifice the Chief Minister's post for a Dalit", adding that Congress high command will decide the next CM if the party wins. Stating that MLAs will be asked to give their recommendation, he added that any "forced decision" detrimental to governance will not be taken.
summary: दलित उम्मीदवार के लिए सीएम पद छोड़ने को तैयार: सिद्धारमैया

text: During a conference call regarding SpaceX's Falcon 9 Block 5 rocket launch, Elon Musk revealed, "I love NASA so much that literally my password was 'ILoveNASA'". "Just like a friend that really cares, they can be a pain in the ass," he added. SpaceX recently completed the Falcon 9 Block 5 flight, capable of over 10 flights with limited refurbishment.
summary: मुझे नासा से इतना प्यार है कि मेरा पासवर्ड 'ILoveNASA' था: मस्क

text: Italian researchers have developed a robotic hand called 'Hennes', priced at $11,900, which lets users grip objects more naturally. The hand features only one motor that controls all five fingers and is characterised by sensors that react to electrical signals from the brain to the muscles. The researchers claim that the hand weighs about the same as a human hand.
summary: $ 11,900 रोबोट हाथ उपयोगकर्ताओं को स्वाभाविक रूप से वस्तुओं को पकड़ने देता है

text: SoftBank is liable to pay 40% capital gains tax of $600 million if the Japanese conglomerate plans to sell its 20-22% share in Flipkart before August 2019. The tax applies only if SoftBank exits less than a year after investing in Flipkart. Earlier, SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son confirmed its investment of $2.5 billion in Flipkart is worth $4 billion.
summary: अगर फ्लिपकार्ट हिस्सेदारी बेचती है तो सॉफ्टबैंक को $ 600 मिलियन टैक्स का सामना करना पड़ सकता है

text: After former Pakistan PM Nawaz Sharif admitted that Pakistan-based terrorist organisations were responsible for the 26/11 Mumbai attacks, Defence Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said, "Der aaye durust aaye (better late than never)." Stating that India has always held that the terror attacks were carried out by Pakistani masterminds, she added that Sharif's acceptance does not "shock" her.
summary: Der aaye durust aaye: पूर्व प्रधानमंत्री पर सरकार ने 26/11 में पाक की भूमिका स्वीकार की

text: The government is reportedly planning to propose a nationwide ban on using petcoke as a fuel to comply with a Supreme Court order. The proposal follows a ban on petcoke ordered by the apex court in October in the region around New Delhi. Petcoke has higher energy content than coal but releases larger amounts of sulfur dioxide and carbon dioxide.
summary: सरकार ने ईंधन के रूप में पेटोक पर देशव्यापी प्रतिबंध का प्रस्ताव करने की योजना बनाई है

text: At least seven people were killed and 12 were injured after a bus skidded off the road and rolled down the hill in Himachal Pradesh's Sirmaur on Sunday. The cause of the accident is yet to be ascertained, Sirmaur Deputy Commissioner Lalit Jain said. People in the area began rescue operations even before authorities reached the spot, reports said.
summary: हिमाचल में पहाड़ी से नीचे लुढ़कने से 7 की मौत, 12 घायल

text: The Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC) has told the Delhi High Court that the nominal fee charged for toilets and drinking water at its stations is to prevent misuse. However, the DMRC added that someone who is unable to pay the charges will be provided drinking water or use of toilets free of cost if they approach the station's staff.
summary: शौचालय के दुरुपयोग को रोकने के लिए नाममात्र शुल्क: दिल्ली मेट्रो से एच.सी.

text: Actor Ranbir Kapoor, while talking about his mother actress Neetu Kapoor, said, "Everything I am today, the person that I am today, both professionally and personally it is because of my mother." Discussing the relevance of Mother's Day, Ranbir added, "I think every day is Mother's Day and we should celebrate our mothers every day."
summary: आज मैं जो व्यक्ति हूं, वह मेरी मां नीतू की वजह से है: रणबीर

text: Late actress Sridevi's daughter Janhvi Kapoor took to Instagram to share an old picture with her on the occasion of Mother's Day. The picture shows Janhvi as a child posing for the camera. The actress passed away at the age of 54 on February 24 in Dubai due to accidental drowning.
summary: जान्हवी ने मदर्स डे पर मां श्रीदेवी के साथ पुरानी तस्वीर शेयर की

text: RCB's Mandeep Singh pulled off an acrobatic boundary save against DD in the IPL 2018 on Saturday. DD's Rishabh Pant pulled an Umesh Yadav delivery in the 5th over towards square leg, where Mandeep leapt to his left and flicked the ball back into play with his outstretched left hand. Pant managed to take just a single off the delivery.
summary: मनदीप एक हाथ से चार रन के लिए गेंद को बचाने के लिए कूदते हैं

text: CSK captain MS Dhoni scared all-rounder Ravindra Jadeja by pretending to throw the ball at him while fielding against SRH on Sunday. The incident happened during the seventh over when Dhoni ran towards the short mid-wicket to field the ball. Dhoni picked the ball and executed the dummy throw at Jadeja, who had come running in from deep mid-wicket.
summary: एमएस धोनी ने जडेजा को डराया, लेकिन उन्होंने गेंद फेंकी

text: Pakistani spinner Shadab Khan, who slammed his maiden Test fifty against Ireland on Saturday, dedicated it to hockey legend Mansoor Ahmed who passed away aged 49 on the same day in Karachi. text: Former Vice President Hamid Ansari has said the AMU students union's demand for a probe into the row over a portrait of Pakistan founder Muhammad Ali Jinnah was justified. In a letter to the students union president, Ansari also noted he had been present during the clashes. Students have alleged that members of right-wing organisations had barged into the university.
summary: पूर्व वीपी अंसारी जिन्ना चित्र पंक्ति में एएमयू छात्रों का समर्थन करते हैं

text: Congress spokesperson Randeep Surjewala has asked PM Narendra Modi to ensure Pakistan is declared a terrorist state by the entire international community and sanctions are imposed upon it for aiding terrorism. This comes after ousted Pakistan PM Nawaz Sharif admitted Pakistan-based terror organisations were behind the 26/11 Mumbai attacks. "Modiji, this is a litmus test for you," Surjewala added.
summary: सुनिश्चित करें कि पाक को आतंकवादी राज्य घोषित किया जाए: कांग्रेस को पीएम

text: A day after ex-Pakistan PM Nawaz Sharif confirmed that militant organisations based in Pakistan carried out 26/11 Mumbai attacks, yoga guru Ramdev said a solution to this problem is that India should invade Pakistan-occupied Kashmir and make it a part of the country. "India should also help in freedom of Balochistan, only then Pakistan will correct its course," he added.
summary: पाक अधिकृत कश्मीर पर आक्रमण करें, इसे भारत का हिस्सा बनाएं: रामदेव

text: The CBI has denied confirming rape charge against BJP MLA Kuldeep Sengar in the Unnao rape case, calling such reports "purely speculative". The legislator is accused of abducting and raping the victim at his home last year. His brother is also accused of beating the victim's father who was in judicial custody and died hours later at a hospital.
summary: सीबीआई ने रिपोर्ट से इनकार किया कि उसने उन्नाव विधायक के खिलाफ बलात्कार के आरोप की पुष्टि की

text: Starbucks Chairman Howard Schultz has said that bathrooms at all of the company's stores are open to everyone whether they are paying customers or not. The statement comes following an incident at a Philadelphia Starbucks store where two black men were arrested for trespassing after one of them was denied access to bathroom as he was not a paying customer.
summary: हमारे बाथरूम सभी के लिए खुले हैं, ग्राहक या नहीं: स्टारबक्स प्रमुख

text: All US governments are oppressive, regardless of whether they are run by Republicans or Democrats, WikiLeaks source Chelsea Manning has said. "We move from one administration to another but the actual problems don't get addressed," Manning added. Notably, Manning, who was sentenced to 35 years in prison for leaking classified documents to WikiLeaks, was pardoned by former President Barack Obama.

text: UN World Food Programme chief David Beasley, who was on a four-day trip to North Korea, said that the nation is impoverished but starvation is not as high as it was during the famine in the 1990s. "I see a country that is working hard to achieve food security and good nutrition... [but] there are significant challenges ahead," Beasley said.
summary: एन कोरिया अधमरा नहीं बल्कि भूखा था: संयुक्त राष्ट्र खाद्य कार्यक्रम प्रमुख

text: The Finance Ministry has said Lok Ranjan will continue as an independent director on ICICI Bank's board despite his transfer to the Personnel Ministry. The reshuffling comes amid allegations of conflict of interest faced by ICICI CEO Chanda Kochhar in extending a Ã¢ÂÂ¹3,250-crore loan to Videocon Group. Notably, Ranjan had skipped board meetings of ICICI Bank held last week.
summary: लोक रंजन को ICICI बोर्ड में सरकार के उम्मीदवार के रूप में जारी रखने के लिए

text: The customs department is planning to allow shipments by e-commerce companies in India through all Foreign Post Offices, the Finance Ministry has said. E-commerce exports had been allowed through Foreign Post Offices under Merchandise Export from India Scheme (MEIS) since 2016. The new simplified procedure for exports through India Post will boost Make in India programme, Finance Ministry claims.
summary: जल्द ही सभी विदेशी डाकघरों के माध्यम से ई-कॉमर्स का निर्यात: सरकार

text: The Competition Commission of India has planned to assess ticket pricing algorithms used by domestic airlines to check for possible cartelisation. CCI Chairperson DK Sikri said the issue came up after the 2016 Jat agitation when ticket prices on Chandigarh-Delhi flights increased sharply. "We asked the airlines. (They said) we don't know, the algorithms are driving it up," Sikri added.
summary: संभावित मूल्य निर्धारण पर सीसीआई स्कैनर के तहत एयरलाइन कंपनियां

text: State-owned lender Andhra Bank has filed an insolvency petition against pharmaceutical firm Sterling Biotech to recover about Ã¢ÂÂ¹5,400 crore. The Gujarat-based firm took loans of over Ã¢ÂÂ¹5,000 crore from an Andhra Bank-led consortium, which turned into bad loans. The bank argued that investigative agencies are already probing the case, while promoters of the company have fled the country.

text: The doctors at AIIMS Delhi performed a hip joint replacement surgery using a customised 3D-printed medical implant on April 25, which has recently been declared successful. Doctors revealed the 40-year-old patient was in intensive care for three days after the 8-hour surgery in which he required about 15 units of blood. The surgery took around five months to plan.

text: A knife-wielding man shouting "Allah Akbar" on Saturday killed one person and wounded four others in Paris, France, before being shot dead. Militant group Islamic State later said one of its soldiers carried out the attack. The country has been on high alert following a series of attacks that has killed more than 240 people since 2015.
summary: पेरिस में इस्लामिक स्टेट के हमले में 1 की मौत, 4 घायल

text: A senior cardiac surgeon has sued Max Super Specialty Hospital in Punjab's Mohali alleging it asked him to pay Ã¢ÂÂ¹15,000 as "referral money" for patients referred to him for surgeries. He further claimed the hospital first stopped referring patients to him and then terminated his contract when he told the hospital he would not "buy" patients.
summary: डॉक्स ने मैक्स अस्पताल पर मुकदमा दायर किया, आरोपों में मरीजों को 'खरीदने' के लिए कहा गया था

text: The Kolkata Police on Saturday arrested a man for allegedly masturbating in a bus while looking at two women, who recorded a video of the incident and posted it on Facebook. The women claimed that the man, identified as Asit Roy, had also flashed his genitals at them 15 days ago but they didn't complain as they didn't have proof.

text: US President Donald Trump on Saturday praised North Korea's decision to dismantle its nuclear test site in a ceremony scheduled between May 23 and 25. "Thank you, a very smart and gracious gesture!" Trump tweeted. The dismantlement of the site would involve collapsing all of its tunnels, blocking its entrances, and removing all observation facilities, research buildings and security posts.

text: German online bank Bitbond has been using Bitcoin to transfer loans throughout the world. Bitbond uses the cryptocurrency to bypass SWIFT international transfer system to lend money across the globe at low cost. "Traditional money transfers are relatively costly due to currency exchange fees, and can take up to a few days," Bitbond Founder and CEO Radoslav Albrecht said.

text: Four state-owned banks reported a combined net loss of Ã¢ÂÂ¹11,729 crore for the fourth quarter of FY18 after rise in bad loan provisions. Canara Bank reported maximum net loss at Ã¢ÂÂ¹4,860 crore and Allahabad Bank posted a loss of Ã¢ÂÂ¹3,510 crore for March quarter. UCO Bank reported a Ã¢ÂÂ¹2,134-crore loss, and Dena Bank made a net loss of Ã¢ÂÂ¹1,225 crore.
summary: चार राज्य के स्वामित्व वाले बैंकों ने संयुक्त रूप से ¢ crore11,729 करोड़ Q4 नुकसान की रिपोर्ट की

text: The first song of Harshvardhan Kapoor starrer film 'Bhavesh Joshi Superhero' has been released. The song titled 'Hum Hain Insaaf' has been composed by Amit Trivedi while the lyrics have been penned by Anurag Kashyap, Babu Haabi and Naezy. The film has been directed by Vikramaditya Motwane and is scheduled to release on May 25.
summary: हर्षवर्धन की 'भावेश जोशी सुपरहीरो' का पहला गाना

text: Actress Sunny Leone, who turns 37 today, worked at a German bakery in the United States when she was 15 years old. Sunny also worked at a tax and retirement firm before she started working in Bollywood films. The actress made her Bollywood debut in 2012 with the erotic thriller film 'Jism 2' directed by Pooja Bhatt.

text: Sharing an old interview of Rishi Kapoor and herself, Neetu Kapoor wrote, "This was totally unintentional was asked to compare junior and senior!!! His expressions (are) priceless." "(Rishi) is a brat, he is a bully. And he is loud. Ranbir is totally down-to-earth, simple and never loses his cool," she had said in the video while Rishi stared at her.

text: American woman Annie Dillard from South Carolina earned her fourth educational degree at the age of 92 from the Midlands Technical College. Dillard had earned her first bachelor's degree in her 60s and had decided to earn the Associates Degree in Liberal Arts at Midlands Technical College five years ago. Dillard plans to begin another degree in two weeks time.

text: DD spinner Sandeep Lamichhane on Saturday became the first cricketer from Nepal to play in the IPL. Lamichhane, aged 17 years and 283 days, dismissed RCB's Parthiv Patel to become the second youngest overseas player to take a wicket in the IPL. Afghan spinner Mujeeb Ur Rahman is the youngest to achieve the feat at 17 years and 11 days.
summary: 1 नेपाल के खिलाड़ी दूसरे सबसे कम उम्र के विदेशी खिलाड़ी हैं जिन्होंने आईपीएल में विकेट लिया है

text: Virat Kohli and AB de Villiers slammed 70 and 72* respectively as RCB defeated DD in the IPL 2018 on Saturday. With the defeat, Delhi Daredevils are now officially eliminated from the IPL 2018 playoff race, with just 6 points from 12 matches. Further, this is the sixth consecutive season in which DD failed to progress beyond the league stage.
