text: After PM Narendra Modi visited Muktinath and Pashupatinath temples in Nepal on Saturday, Congress leader Ashok Gehlot alleged the move was aimed at influencing Karnataka voters. "As there is a model code of conduct in Karnataka, PM Modi planned to pray at temples in Nepal instead, just to influence voters. This is not a good trend for democracy," he said.

text: A fan invaded the field and took a selfie with captain Virat Kohli during the fifth over of RCB's chase against Delhi Daredevils at Delhi's Feroz Shah Kotla stadium on Saturday. text: The BCCI is set to host a one-off exhibition T20 match along the lines of the Indian Premier League for women cricketers. The match, which will reportedly feature 20 Indian cricketers and 10 foreign cricketers, will be hosted on May 22 before the first playoff. The Indian players for the match will reportedly be selected by the national selection committee.

text: Real Madrid's Welsh forward Gareth Bale struck twice in Cristiano Ronaldo's absence to help Real Madrid register a 6-0 win over Celta Vigo in the La Liga on Saturday. Real stay third in the points table with 75 points, 15 behind already-crowned champions Barcelona and three behind city rivals Atletico Madrid with one game left to play.
summary: रोनाल्डो-कम रियल मैड्रिड की 6-0 की जीत में दो बार गठरी

text: Bihar CM Nitish Kumar on Saturday attended the wedding of RJD supremo Lalu Prasad Yadav's son Tej Pratap, almost nine months after ending the Grand Alliance and forming government with BJP. While Lalu's younger son Tejashwi was Deputy CM in Kumar's former government, Tej served as Health Minister. Deputy CM Sushil Kumar Modi was also reportedly invited to the wedding.

text: A boat ferrying around 120 passengers to Andhra Pradesh's Papikondalu caught fire on Friday, following which all passengers were safely evacuated. The staff halted the boat near a shore after spotting the fire, which is suspected to have erupted due to a short circuit in the boat's engine. Police reached the spot and rescued all passengers using two boats.

text: Responding to a question by a parliamentary panel, National Cyber Security chief Gulshan Rai said India has not "made concerted efforts" to confront Facebook over any data breach of Indian users. "The question is whether we can enforce legal provisions. I think we can... What matters is how to enforce our own legal provisions," Rai added.
summary: अभी तक डेटा ब्रीच पर फेसबुक का सामना नहीं किया है: सरकार

text: Vishva Hindu Parishad International President Vishnu Sadashiv Kokje has warned that Hindus will launch a nationwide agitation if the Supreme Court gives a verdict against the construction of Ram Temple in Ayodhya. He added that crores of Hindu protestors will pressurise the MPs to pass a bill providing for the construction of Ram Temple at the site.
summary: राम मंदिर के खिलाफ SC का फैसला: हिंदुओं का विरोध होगा: VHP

text: A 75-year-old woman allegedly committed suicide by hanging herself at her home in Hyderabad after her children refused to take her to a wedding function. The family had refused to take her due to her health problems, according to the police. A case has been registered and investigation into the incident is underway.

text: The Savitribai Phule Pune University has appointed 60 special police officers who have the authority to arrest any individual violating security guidelines without a warrant. The new team consists of 50 male and 10 female officers. "Their level of expertise...would lead to creating a sense of discipline on the campus," University Spokesperson Abhijit Ghorpade said.

text: A video of a French family narrowly escaping an attack by cheetahs at a Dutch safari park after they left their car to take photographs has surfaced online. The family got out of the car despite being instructed to not leave the vehicle. "We very nearly saw an entire family torn apart," a man who filmed the encounter said.

text: Clara Harris, a 60-year-old dentist from Texas, was released from prison after serving a 15-year sentence for running over her cheating husband three times in a parking lot in 2002. During the time of the crime, Clara's then 17-year-old daughter was in the passenger's seat and a private investigator hired to spy on her husband was filming the act.
summary: 3 बार पति को धोखा देने वाली महिला जेल से छूटी

text: The RBI has barred public sector lender Dena Bank from taking fresh loan exposure and recruitment of staff, in view of high net non-performing assets and negative Return on Assets. Dena Bank had on Friday reported a net loss of Ã¢ÂÂ¹1,225 crore for the March quarter. RBI had in May last year initiated prompt corrective action against the bank.

text: Karnataka on Saturday witnessed a voter turnout of 70% till 6 pm, short of the 71.2% turnout recorded in 2013. 58,000 polling booths were set up for 222 of the 224 electoral constituencies; however, polling was cancelled at a polling station in Hebbal constituency after EVMs malfunctioned. 883 of the over 2,600 candidates who contested the elections are reportedly crorepatis.
summary: कर्नाटक में विधानसभा चुनाव के लिए 70% मतदान हुआ

text: Exit polls have predicted Karnataka will face a Hung Assembly as no party will be able to secure the 113 seats required to form the government in the 224-member Assembly. While India Today polls suggested that BJP is likely to win 79-92 seats against Congress winning 106-118 seats, Times Now suggested that BJP will form the government with majority.
summary: एग्जिट पोल कर्नाटक में त्रिशंकु विधानसभा की भविष्यवाणी करते हैं

text: RJD supremo Lalu Prasad Yadav's son Tej Pratap married RJD MLA Chandrika Rai's daughter Aishwarya Rai on Saturday. Bihar CM Nitish Kumar, Union Minister Ram Vilas Paswan, and lawyer Ram Jethmalani were among those who attended the wedding. While around 50 horses were part of the wedding procession, over 100 cooks prepared food for around 7,000 guests.

text: The Election Commission on Saturday ordered re-elections at a polling booth in Hebbal constituency's Lottegollahalli area due to the failure of EVM machines. This comes after Congress leader Brijesh Kalappa claimed that EVMs at a polling booth in the constituency registered votes only for the BJP due to a technical glitch.
summary: ईवीएम विफल होने के कारण हेब्बल निर्वाचन क्षेत्र के बूथ पर फिर से मतदान का आदेश दिया गया

text: Delhi Daredevils' all-rounder Abhishek Sharma slammed the highest-ever score by a 17-year-old in the IPL after slamming 46*(19) against Royal Challengers Bangalore on Saturday. Playing a T20 for the first time, the 2018 Under-19 World Cup-winner smashed four sixes and three fours in his knock. Abhishek's score was also the highest IPL debut score by a batsman aged below 19.

text: Toro Rosso F1 driver Brendon Hartley crashed his car into the barriers during the final practice for the Spanish Grand Prix on Saturday. The rear of his car broke away from the rest of the chassis while being lifted away by crane. The New Zealander was taken to the medical centre, where he was declared fit.
summary: एफ 1 कार टुकड़ों में टूट जाती है क्योंकि ड्राइवर इसे बाधाओं में बदल देता है

text: The Maharashtra government's new Development Plan (DP) for Mumbai legally allows functioning of restaurants on rooftops in the city. Currently, most of the rooftop bars and restaurants operating in Mumbai have either been allowed as temporary structures or are illegal. The decision comes months after a fire in two rooftop eateries in the city's Kamala Mills left 14 people dead.

text: After former Pakistani PM Nawaz Sharif admitted that Pakistani organisations carried out the 26/11 attacks, Indian public prosecutor Ujjwal Nikam said the interview proves the Pakistan government was ISI and Pakistan Army's puppet. Asserting that Sharif's statement is important for India, he added, "This proves that...he was aware of the 26/11 attack, but still didn't try to end its trial."
summary: Ex-Pak PM का इंटरव्यू दिखाता है ISI की कठपुतली: 26/11 वकील

text: The Supreme Court has ruled that a woman can file a complaint against her ex-husband for committing cruelty under the domestic violence law even after securing a divorce. The SC refused to interfere in a Rajasthan High Court order, which held that the absence of a domestic relationship will not stop the court from providing relief to the affected woman.
summary: घरेलू हिंसा की शिकायत तलाक के बाद दर्ज की जा सकती है: एस.सी.

text: According to reports, Vaani Kapoor will star opposite Ranbir Kapoor in the Yash Raj Films (YRF) production 'Shamshera'. Ranbir will be seen as a dacoit, whereas Sanjay Dutt will be seen playing the villain in the film directed by Karan Malhotra. Vaani was last seen in YRF's 2016 film 'Befikre' opposite Ranveer Singh.

text: Talking about the kind of media attention that her nephew Taimur Ali Khan gets, actress Soha Ali Khan said, "He has a right to his privacy and that needs to be respected by the media." Soha added, "It is all normal for him but childhood is about innocence and he shouldn't be robbed of that."
summary: सोहा का कहना है कि मीडिया को तैमूर के निजता के अधिकार का सम्मान करने की जरूरत है

text: Singer-actor Himesh Reshammiya, who got married to his live-in girlfriend Sonia Kapoor at his residence in Mumbai, said, "I have loved her unconditionally and the same is with her." "I am really happy that Sonia and I have started this new journey," added Himesh. Their wedding was attended by family and close friends including his son Swaym.n
summary: मैंने उसे बिना शर्त प्यार किया है: सोनिया से शादी करने पर हिमेश

text: US comedy show 'Brooklyn Nine-Nine' was picked up by American TV network NBC after rival network Fox had decided to cancel the show one day before. Following Fox's decision, users on Twitter and other social media platforms began the '#SaveB99' hashtag, pleading other networks to pick up the show. NBC's head of entertainment called the network the show's 'rightful home'.
summary: यूएस कॉमेडी शो फॉक्स प्रतिद्वंद्वी द्वारा रद्द करने के एक दिन बाद उठाया गया

text: Talking about making her debut appearance at Cannes Film Festival 2018, Pakistani actress Mahira Khan said, "I feel like I am a player for a Pakistani team." She called it a proud moment for Pakistan. She added, "I have to be a little careful of what I say since I am representing Pakistan on an international stage."

This comes ahead of US President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un's meeting in Singapore on June 12.
summary: एन कोरिया को समृद्ध करने में मदद करेगा यदि यह नापसंद करता है: यूएस स्टेट सेकी

text: Chennai Super Kings spinner Harbhajan Singh bowled Rajasthan Royals' English all-rounder Ben Stokes after getting hit for a six on the previous ball. Harbhajan had conceded ten runs off the fourth and fifth balls of the over before sending in a ball that turned inwards into the left-hander who missed the ball while charging towards it.
summary: हरभजन ने 4 और 6 रन बनाकर स्टोक्स को क्लीन बोल्ड कर दिया

text: BJP candidate B Sriramulu performed gau puja before casting his vote in Karnataka Assembly polls. He is contesting from the Badami seat against incumbent Congress CM Siddaramaiah. Recently, Congress released two videos dated 2010 showing him allegedly negotiating a bribe with then Chief Justice KG Balakrishnan's relative for a favourable verdict in a case involving mining baron Janardhana Reddy.
summary: वोट डालने से पहले बीजेपी कतकाका उम्मीदवार गौ पूजा करती है

text: A Muslim woman was asked to remove her burkha for identification at a polling booth in Karnataka's Belagavi on Saturday, following which she argued with officials and started crying. Earlier this year, a muslim woman was also asked to remove her burkha at Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Aditynath's rally. Results of Karnataka Assembly elections would be declared on May 15.
summary: मुस्लिम महिला ने K'taka पोलिंग बूथ पर बुर्क़ा हटाने को कहा

text: No incumbent government has been re-elected in Karnataka since 1985 when the Janata Dal secured a majority and Ramakrishna Hegde became the chief minister. The Karnataka Assembly elections, for which voting began today, has 2,654 candidates and an electorate of nearly five crore people. Over 55,000 polling stations have been set up for the 222 electoral constituencies.
summary: K'taka में कोई अवलंबी सरकार 1985 के बाद से फिर से निर्वाचित नहीं हुई है

text: BJP's Karnataka CM candidate BS Yeddyurappa on Saturday said, "We (BJP) will get more than 150 seats and I'm going to make the government on May 17." "People are fed up with the Siddaramaiah government. I urge people to come out and vote for BJP. I assure the people of Karnataka that I'm going to give good governance," he added.
summary: भाजपा को कट्टाका में 150 से अधिक सीटें मिलेंगी: पार्टी सीएम उम्मीदवार

text: Following the claims of a verbal spat between Kings XI Punjab mentor Virender Sehwag and owner Preity Zinta, the team issued a statement that said that the culture in the team encourages open and frank debate. The statement further read that the culture in the team is open and non-hierarchical, with debates aimed towards the common goal of continuous improvement.
summary: खुली और खुलकर बहस को प्रोत्साहित करें: KXIP प्रीति-सहवाग पर

text: Following Chennai Super Kings' loss to Rajasthan Royals on Friday, captain MS Dhoni said that to some extent bowlers let the team down as CSK's 178 was a "par plus score". "Once told what to bowl, you need to be bowling to that area... commit and execute. It is not the planning but the execution that goes haywire," Dhoni added.
summary: गेंदबाज हमें निराश करते हैं: सीएसके के बाद धोनी 178 का बचाव करने में विफल रहे

text: Facebook has responded to the Indian government's latest notice over data scandal, detailing the changes it has made to protect its users' information and elections from abuse. The notice was sent in March asking whether Indian voters' data was harvested to influence elections. Facebook earlier admitted that data of over 5 lakh Indians was leaked to British firm Cambridge Analytica.
summary: डेटा स्कैंडल पर भारतीय सरकार के नोटिस का जवाब फेसबुक ने दिया

text: China's Didi Chuxing has said it'll suspend carpooling service for a week in the country as it's investigating a passenger's murder. The incident happened after the son of a driver registered with Didi accessed his father's app to pick up passengers. The person driving the vehicle wasn't detected by facial recognition as its night safety mechanism was "defective," Didi said.
summary: यात्री की हत्या के बाद दीदी ने कारपूलिंग सेवा स्थगित कर दी

text: In an attempt to understand how Homo sapiens differ from their closest ancestral relatives, scientists will be growing miniature brain tissue from human stem cells edited to contain Neanderthal DNA. Though incapable of thought of feelings, the organoids replicate some basic structures of an adult brain. Previous genome studies have shown that non-Africans today still carry 1-4% of Neanderthal DNA.
summary: निएंडरथल डीएनए का उपयोग करके वैज्ञानिक 'मिनी-ब्रेन' विकसित करने के लिए

text: Visitors at US' Utah state park have been dislodging dinosaur tracks imprinted in sandstone and throwing the pieces into a nearby lake. "They're just looking to throw rocks off the side without realising they are covered with dinosaur tracks," officials said. The park is putting up more warning signs and considering sending a diving team to recover the tracks.
summary: पर्यटक डिनो पटरियों को झील में फेंकते हुए सोचते हैं कि वे चट्टानें हैं

text: Scientists examining approximately 90 skeletons with deformation characteristics of leprosy have found the oldest strains of the disease came from Britain dating to 500 AD. Researchers further found that all known strains of leprosy were present in Medieval Europe, suggesting that it may already have been widespread throughout Asia and Europe or it might have originated in western Eurasia.
summary: कुष्ठ रोग की उत्पत्ति यूरोप में हुई है, एशिया में नहीं: अध्ययन

text: BJP MLA Surendra Singh has termed PM Narendra Modi a reincarnation of Lord Ram, while calling BJP President Amit Shah as Lord Ram's brother Laxman and Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath as Hanuman. "This team of Ram, Laxman and Hanuman will realise the dream of Ram Rajya in Bharat," he added. He also compared Amit Shah to Chanakya.
summary: पीएम मोदी ने किया राम का अवतार, CM योगी हैं हनुमान: BJP MLA

text: As many as 50 horses will be a part of the 'baraat' procession during RJD chief Lalu Prasad Yadav's son Tej Pratap's wedding to party legislature's daughter Aishwarya Rai on Saturday. Around 7,000 guests, including Bihar CM Nitish Kumar and Deputy CM Sushil Modi, are invited to attend the function, with over 100 cooks assigned the task of catering.
summary: लालू के बेटे तेज की शादी में 'बारात' के लिए आए 50 घोड़े

text: The Centre is planning to come up with a policy mandating monetisation of assets by state-owned firms, according to reports. As part of the plan, the government also plans to look at sector-specific frameworks, reports added. The government is intending to finalise the policy by the end of the current financial year.
summary: पीएसयू द्वारा परिसंपत्ति मुद्रीकरण को अनिवार्य बनाने वाली केंद्र योजना नीति

text: A 20-year-old student in Madhya Pradesh allegedly died due to a heart attack after he wasn't allowed to give his college examinations over non-payment of fees. The student wasn't given the admit card as he fell short of Ã¢ÂÂ¹300 while depositing the fee of Ã¢ÂÂ¹26,000. Following the incident, his relatives and neighbours blocked a road, demanding action against the college.
summary: परीक्षा देने से रोकने पर छात्र की हार्ट अटैक से मौत हो गई

text: Voting for 222 of 224 constituencies in the Karnataka Assembly elections began at 7am today and will go on till 6pm. The Election Commission deferred voting for the RR Nagar seat after nearly 10,000 voter identity cards were seized from a flat, while that for Jayanagar constituency was cancelled after the death of BJP candidate BN Vijayakumar while campaigning.
summary: कर्नाटक विधानसभा चुनाव के लिए मतदान शुरू

text: Talking about the controversy surrounding his film 'Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran', John Abraham said, "We're not here to throw mud on anybody's face, we want to keep it clean." Earlier, an FIR was filed against John by KriArj Entertainment, the co-producers of the film, for allegedly cheating them by terminating their contract. However, John won the case against KriArj.
summary: किसी के चेहरे पर कीचड़ फेंकने के लिए यहां नहीं: जॉन परमारू पंक्ति पर

text: A vegetable vendor from Maharashtra's Aurangabad committed suicide after receiving an incorrect electricity bill amounting to over Ã¢ÂÂ¹8 lakh for his two-room tin shed house. The state electricity distributor suspended a billing clerk after it was found that meter readings were incorrectly punched at 61,178 KWH instead of 6,117.8 KWH. However, police have registered an "accidental death" case.
summary: सब्जी विक्रेता ¢ Â‚Â¹8-लाख बिजली बिल प्राप्त करने के बाद आत्म हत्या कर लेता है

text: An IIT Kanpur student has said his engineering skills helped him save a man's life on board a flight. Karttikeya Mangalam said that a co-passenger suffering from Type 1 Diabetes had forgotten his insulin injecting device. Mangalam obtained a similar device from another passenger, used in-flight WiFi to search for insulin pen diagram and made a make-shift insulin pen.
summary: IIT छात्र इंजीनियरिंग कौशल का उपयोग करके उड़ान में आदमी को बचाता है

text: Maharashtra CM Devendra Fadnavis' helicopter travel cost Ã¢ÂÂ¹7.2 crore in 2016-17, activist Anil Galgali has said citing an RTI response. An average of Ã¢ÂÂ¹6 crore was spent in three years to fund the CM's helicopter travel. The cost increased after a chopper ferrying CM Fadnavis crashed and got damaged beyond repair in 2017, leading to the rental of new helicopters.
summary: महाराष्ट्र सीएम के हेलीकॉप्टर यात्रा की लागत पिछले साल cost last7 करोड़ थी

text: A video showing a reported laundryman stitching a body after autopsy at a government-run hospital in Tamil Nadu's Thuraiyur has surfaced online. The hospital's laundryman, who is seen wearing a dhoti and surgical gloves, stitched the body as the doctors were on leave, reports said. The state health department has launched a high-level probe into the incident.
summary: लॉन्ड्रीमैन टीएन सरकार अस्पताल में शव परीक्षण के बाद शरीर को टाँके लगाता है

text: In his letter to Maharashtra CM Devendra Fadnavis and Mumbai Police, constable Dnyaneshwar Ahirrao sought permission to "beg in uniform" as he hasn't received salary for two months. Ahirrao, posted with security team at Shiv Sena chief Uddhav Thackeray's residence, took an "emergency leave" for five days after his wife suffered a fracture. He stopped receiving salary after the incident.
summary: मुंबई पुलिस ने बिना वेतन के वर्दी में भीख मांगने की अनुमति मांगी

text: Storyteller Ankit Chadha died at the age of 30 on Wednesday night after he drowned in the Uksan Lake near Pune. He had reportedly gone to the lake with a friend when he lost his balance and fell in. Chadha, who was known for his storytelling in Urdu, was in the city for a performance scheduled for Saturday.
summary: कहानीकार अंकित चड्ढा पुणे के पास झील में डूब गया

text: Two separate incidents of mob lynching took place in Tamil Nadu in one day due to false WhatsApp messages asking residents to beware of immigrants who kidnap children. On Wednesday, a mob beat a man to death and hung him to a bridge. In another incident, a 65-year-old woman was lynched after a mob attacked her and her four relatives.
summary: बाल तस्करी पर नकली व्हाट्सएप संदेशों पर 2 की मौत
